CkPJaIZPKj0fQLZ-qp8udA.text: Amazing as always. I make it a point to eat here everytime I'm on Vegas. Food is fresh, hot and taste amazing. The folks working here are friendly and always have a smile. The people watching makes this location the best :)

WQxtml2qGGFvv-x72dvWFw.text: Visit was made on 6/29/19. Was able to order from the bar directly across from host stand. It was a 30mins. wait for a table. Ended up ordering at the bar which was quite convenient. They have a specific menu to order from if you do this, otherwise have to order from actual menu at the wahlburgers counter Togo. Which still wasn't an issue. Honestly the best burgers we've ever had in our lives. BBQ BACON BURGER was so delicious, fresh jalapenos were perfect. Super light on the avocado spread though.  but boy oh boy the burger was crisp, hot in temperature.  ordered THE OUR BURGER and oh my gaaahhhhhh. Loaded with veggies. It was a tall burger, so fresh nothing soggy in it. I'm salivating writing this. Take me baaaccckkkkkk. Onion rings were so good too. The kids Mac and cheese taste fresh and real too. Tater tots were crispy and not too oily. All reasonably priced too.

BYYpKozjgNBbaUt-Z94wLQ.text: Man very disappointed with the quality of the food here. I love Marky Mark and I think I just had higher expectations.   The burger was mediocre. All the toppings you had to pay extra for even the lettuce! The fries weren't crispy but soggy. The burger fell apart instantly. Even the Whalsauce was nothing special.   Great location for tourist though so revenue must be good but with so many burger joints on the strip, you have to stand out.

roupQpuuhbKcyez_1q8_nA.text: Being from Boston, I have eaten at the original Wahlburgers in Boston. I'm a huge fan of this restaurant, not only because of its food and drink, but also the fun environment and that I'm a huge fan of Marky Mark! I was in the Las Vegas area with my fiance and two of our friends. We were looking for a bite to eat. We had experienced fine dining all week and even though the prices were ridiculously expensive, our meals always sucked. We just wanted a good burger. We decided upon Wahlburgers and we were able to walk right in and get a seat at the bar. We each ordered a burger and a beverage. My friend got the coffee, boozy shake and it was delicious. The girl made a shake and then gave us the extra cup and I drank off of that one. I ordered the grass fed burger and it was delicious. It was a little pricier, but totally worth it. All of our food was good, but our service was terrible. I don't think I've ever had such a rude server in my entire life. She was rude to ask, condescended to us, and berated us. I wish I knew her name, but she was so rude that she left in the middle of serving us and had another girl take over. The second girl was super sweet and we enjoyed ourselves the rest of the time. One of my friends is the nicest guy ever and he even said she was the meanest server he's ever experienced. Overall, I will always remember this experience and how rude she was! If Marky Mark knew about this he would be furious. :)

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Boozy shake =yum
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. You gotta go for it!
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The sweet potato fries weren&#39;t bad either

Eyhe4JZ_wdmvKdggCR64-Q.text: Prices are $12-18, but the food was pretty mediocre. I got the BBQ Bacon Burger. It was alright. I thought it was pretty average. I was disappointed because I was still hungry after finishing it. The menu says that it is 1/3 pound, but it didn't feel like it. Also, it didn't come with fries. For the price, I either want to be filled up, or get above average food that is particularly good, preferably both. I didn't feel like I got either of those things, so I was disappointed.

cTo2L04CUvGCilvogIQKqw.text: I am a fan of the show so I was excited to try this place out. It was packed but we were able to get a table and the service and food wait time was fine.   The burger itself..meh. It was a decent size, super messy but honestly lacked flavor. I had the BBQ burger. We had just a side of fry's to share. Those just tasted like run of the mill fry's that you order from your food company. Everyone else in my party liked their food but it just was not hitting for me.  It was not worth the price.

tSp84vDp5H4Vnimt818Nwg.text: Came here on 3/26/17 around 130. The hostess said 20 minutes and took our phone #. We sat out front and waited, and waited, and waited. Girlfriend goes to see what's taking so long. They said they already text and we didn't respond. Funny she was holding her phone the whole time waiting. Finally seated and waited another 15 minutes for the waiter. Split a double cheeseburger  (which was average) BUDS IN VALLEJO IS BETTER. Tator tots, root beer float, and Mac n cheese(very good). Took a while to get the check too. Felt like pulling a runner. Tried it because we watch the show. Kind of a let down.

OjKXFfAjumnUXP35HW7Vow.text: Delicious!  Probably the best meal and drink I had while in Las Vegas!

cfq15oDilXxK2fWIIeUVZA.text: Have been looking forward to eating at Wahlburgers since watching the TV show. When I found out there was a Wahlburgers in Vegas, I made it a point to eat there. Unfortunately, I was sooo disappointed. First, this restaurant is in open patio/bar setting. Which is ok, after all this is Vegas. For $10, I expected a gourmet burger. The hamburger came with a smashed down cold bun, another $5 for lukewarm, limp fries and $5 for a diet coke. As for service, the person who took my order was polite, but my order was literally dropped off by a different server who didn't even bring any condiments. Unable to flag down a server, I grabbed  ketchup from another table, and called out a third server for mustard and mayo. I blame my bad experience on the management at this location for there is a lack of quality control. Paul Wahlberg, I'm sure you take pride in your burger chain, but this place does not meet up to Wahlberg standards.

YyAZJPZCbbWUcKLYUK5mFg.text: Super disappointed. Yes the restaurant was busy. The waitress took our order, then we didn't see her again until our party of four was 1/2 way done with our meal, my son walked over to the bar and retrieved his own soda refill. I kept the evil eye contact until she finally came to our table at that point I let her know that our order was incorrect and my food was cold. Her initial reply "I'm busy"

NBeGbGjxrPygeCCIYHt-GA.text: If you're looking for great cafeteria food, then this is your place. Service is absentminded, food is overpriced and the only thing worse is Mark Whalburg's transformers movie...but seriously though, absolutely awful.

y_wJ8jMvDCpT3h12VPoUaA.text: Burgers were dam good!! My only complaint would be that I had to spread out the "toppings" ! The mushrooms, jalapeno, and pickles were all in little piles. Couldn't get the full effect of the sandwich til I spread everything out! Love it, great place.. bartender's were awesome!

jzWoIVJWchzZHgse7zTFgA.text: After reading reviews  about Wahl burgers I know I will never go there and pay absorbent prices for a burger and pay extra for a side of fries. I will just enjoy my In and out double double with grilled onions or  any of Carl Jr's selections. Adios Whal

xbgXoA2WFc8HgaTfcN8Yew.text: Went here to find a burger and was very disappointed with what I received I paid almost 17$ for a jack in the box quality burger. Also not very good service. I will not be back.

WJGC-o8vpI-Z2n5Wf2neSQ.text: The burger was surprisingly delicious. I didn't know what to expect but the burger was a classic. I'm from a small town. So if you want that small town taste of home feel good burger I would check out Wahlburger. Also for all my gluten free people out there. They have delicious gluten free buns. The server said they are made daily from a local bakery! So fresh, fresh, fresh!!!!

W6_0wVcnp-d_5OMNAc00hg.text: I had The Jenny, basically a chicken sandwich with crispy onion strings. It was pretty damn good actually. But the tater tots were lacking. They needed salt and they were kind of cold. My girl had the mac n cheese and it was too runny, that definitely needed improvement.

8zkxQLjgTMiX6LJfBgW1fg.text: Me, my parents, and a childhood friend of mine went here for my 22nd birthday this week. The food was good, but I had to knock two stars off this review because our order of fries came back cold. Our waiter was friendly enough to give us a free, extra order of fries as an apology. When I looked back at the kitchen from our booth, I noticed that several other fries were sitting on the counter for several seconds, even minutes on end. I recommend this place, but if you order fries, they may come back cold.

uhI5ivdS-JW_gq1TPIw--g.text: A regular burger is simple, yet difficult to get right. I love their 'Our' burger - amazing bun and overall great taste. I went there almost every day during my trip! I've been on a quest since then to find an equal/better burger, but I just haven't found it, yet. They really need to open up more than one location in Canada.

-2C4Aja39ag46Oh7A3p3Cw.text: I can only give a recommendation. Be prepared for a long wait. We attempted to go, but it was an hour and twenty minute wait. We decided to move on.

hDVknomeiWheonirQmS-Lw.text: The food was absolutely disgusting, no taste. Everything was blend. The food was overpriced, the portion is small. This place is overrated, don't waste your money.

9hh28qeSWaumjW6W02RVow.text: We had such a great time! We are from Texas, and were visiting friends in Vegas. It was our first time trying this place, for all four of us. We started off with Long Island iced teas, which were perfect and so refreshing, on such a HOT summer day! Then we ordered the Wahlburger #1, w/fries and onion rings. They cook your burger patty to order. The burgers, fries and onion rings were awesome! We ordered the bacon Mac and cheese, WOW! The staff was very nice and Friendly. Great food at a decent price! Highly recommend this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wahlburgers, great food and good times!!!

wThOVJlGRK5blOIGV0SjAA.text: Delicious! I ordered the "Our Burger" with onion rings & was not disappointed. The patty was cooked perfectly and paired nicely with the thinly sliced onion rings. I topped it off with a spiked lemonade. A great meal to get me through a night of Vegas drinking. Definitely coming back on my next visit!

NIkF72KHl4hxV-F2quJAiQ.text: Don't go here for the food.  I hate to write a negative review, but this place was such a disappointment.  I was really looking forward to trying this place out after having seen it on TV.    I guess our first mistake was not ordering burgers at a burger place.  I ordered the Mac and Cheese and my husband order the Sloppy Joes.  My husband actually thought there was something spoiled in the Sloppy Joes and couldn't eat it.  I refused to try it.    The Mac and Cheese taste like a cup of plain penne noodles with some chunks of bacon on top.  It had absolutely zero flavor.  For reference, I have a bland palate, so for me to think something has no flavor is pretty bad.  Drinks we just ok, but at least we could consume those.  Server never asked us how the food was or asked if we wanted boxes for the food we hardly touched.    Second mistake was paying the bill without saying anything about how horrible the food was to the server.  We ended up having to go out for dinner (again) after leaving Wahlburgers.

K0IFqc5ZUzNbSXna-Gw2Tw.text: Came here on a Saturday afternoon and enjoyed the burgers. They weren't the BEST burgers we'd ever had, but they were still pretty decent (maybe we were just super hungry from walking around the Strip all day, haha). The staff & cashiers at the to-go station were friendly. The only thing we didn't like about this place was how small & crowded it gets. Also, this place doesn't have an actual customer restroom which was a little weird. And they could've sat people in the patio section but it was closed that afternoon for whatever reason. Our burgers & fries also came out pretty fast, so that was good. We would come back in the future.

HDqJnwrZmVzHbNgalYerOg.text: Price was a little high but my husband enjoyed his food so that's why I gave it 4 stars. You could either dine in or take it to-go and sit outside. I ordered the melt with fries and my husband ordered the double decker with sweet potato tater tots. My husband said he enjoyed his burger and that he could taste all the ingredients and that it was flavorful including the pickles that they pickle themselves (or so I read). I stole some of his tots and those were really good, I now prefer them over the French fry version lol. The melt I ordered came with toast bread not on a bun. It was a little too greasy/oily/buttery for me, so after a good pat down I was able to eat it. The fries I got were a bit cold and weren't all that great. Its located right in front of the Bally's hotel surrounded by little shops.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YMD8bpmT7ACVuzBg67yiAg.text: I had to try this place and none of us were disappointed(4 pple) and we ordered different things... my sis got the rootbeer float and loved it.. she wanted to go back there more than once just for that.  I had Donnie's favorite the barbecue bacon which comes with jalapenos boy it tasted so good meat was cooked medium well as I asked. All of our fries were crispy and are made pretty quickly idk if they just sit back there or  fried upon order but either way it still tasted fresh. in the end we wind up rushing out but wanted extra fries the guy said ill be back in a minute and he literally was.. everyone's burger was very good and made the way they wanted it..  just check where u sit because some tables and chairs were dirty i guess they need better turn around time cleaning but the food and drinks were on point i would definitely try them again wherever i find a location. Oh u dont have to get government cheese jus sub it like we did. (9/20)

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Root beer used in float
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bbq bacon burger
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Big place

v5zKxE9hUtLeIW4qUDzkkA.text: It's a chain, but it's a pretty tasty chain with quick and decent service from host stand, busser, to server. We were seated at a clean table a few minutes faster than our estimate, which also meant my boyfriend and I had to chug our cold Coronas purchased at a nearby bar advertising some BOGO special in cold weather.   The burgers were cooked to the right temperatures our whole table ordered. We had no leftovers, and it was a delicious lunch. I was impressed to find a clean burger where I didn't drip oil and grease everywhere. It was a pleasant surprise.   // Donnie's Choice x BBQ Bacon Burger: The avocado spread got me, but it was a 1/3 lb. burger (cooked to medium) topped w/ bacon, white cheddar, jalapenos, housemade bbq sauce, and avocado spread. Excellent combination to be honest. Would order again!   My boyfriend's family shared an order of fries and onion rings with the table. The onion rings is honestly a hate it or love it situation as they're very thin. I didn't mind them, but I don't care for onion rings. My boyfriend's sister was not a fan at all, but his parents thoroughly enjoyed them. The french fries were okay, though I assumed they would be a little bit better. Nothing to rave about, unfortunately.   This is a pretty good spot for lunch with pricing pretty fair. The food was good along with service. I wouldn't mind returning, but it would be hard to try something new off their menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BBQ bacon burger: 1/3 lb. burger, white cheddar, jalapenos, BBQ sauce, and avocado spread

-ajZZTKRdjbn4tPKQnBBag.text: Just an ok place to get some food and maybe a drink. nothing special about the food and nothing special about the drinks. the staff were great though as the guy i ordered from even double checked with the chief that the food i ordered was dairy free and I really appreciated that but it was just a burger. good after a way of flying but just a burger.

OUfa0GMLLzzj41t1jdtyXw.text: If you're looking for a quick bite on the strip that won't cost you an arm and a leg, this is it! The service is fast and the quality of the burgers are great. Nothing is over priced and you could get out of here with a meal for about $15. And that's really good considering how much you could spend on the strip elsewhere. Clean restaurant with friendly service. Only down side is the restrooms are located outside the restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon cheese burger.

jIVEcyDDhj0UbU1GG5GG5g.text: I've been here multiple times now.. I was a little disappointed this time around... the waitress was incredibly hard to track down... I ordered my usual the thanksgiving burger (marks choice)... the patty was dry and the sauces were almost non existent. The bun was a little on the tough side as well... I don't frequent Vegas much, but I have a ton of clients that come through Vegas often. This is the place I send all my people to and when I'm here I make it a point to come, and to say I was let down is putting it lightly... we even had to wait about 20 mins after done eating just to get our checks to leave!! One bad experience doesn't condemn a place, but hopefully this is a one time thing... I am a big advocate for this place and don't want to start sending clients other places..

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thanksgiving burger (Mark&#39;s choice)
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Logo

9thRtezNc6RT_InNhUlw4g.text: Great food! We visit every time we're in Las Vegas! The staff is always nice and very kick back! I tried the BBQ Bacon Burger this time and it was so good! Meat was cooked to perfection and the fresh jalapenos on the burger were hot! I've also tried the fiesta burger in the past and it is soo good if you like spicy food! The food will not disappoint you!

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bbq Bacon Burger with chili cheese tots

Fb-gQ5bIbZfcbba6oSy_0A.text: Food is great, drinks are good... service needs help. I understand its Vegas you deal with a bunch of drunks but it's part of the territory. Spent over 300 on drinks and food didnt get any minor gestures or anything. I hope Markey mark sees this and does something about it.

P_-KNTiuSTdvkkRS3i_FqA.text: I have to say after watching many episodes of the Wahlbergs and seeing their hamburgers on t.v I was disappointed with the taste of food. It truly felt like something that can be easily made at home. Perhaps that's the point but either way  I did like the onion rings. They were thinly cut and crispy with lots of flavor

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cheeseburger with regular bread as the bun and onion rings.

HN2uNsqhhv5KEE72IB48dg.text: My friend is a huge fans of the show so she was overly giddy and excited that I was game to go here for dinner. I ordered The Our Burger - sort of - I removed the onions, pickles, tomatoes and added the avocado spread and caramelized onions. It was really good. Everything tasted really fresh, the bun was warmed on the grill, and the restaurant was well designed. I guess the only issue I had is that we clearly weren't the desired "hot" clientele and it was kind of obvious by some of the service but not our waiter, he was great.

zO3Q1aYbh4YT8BuT50byhg.text: February 26, 2019 Tuesday - 4:30 PM for dinner 5 Adults  Atmosphere - 4 stars Food - 5 stars Service - 5 stars  Background - My mother-in-law has been craving this place, and this her second visit during this Vegas trip, my first visit.  Atmosphere - Okay I was surprised as I was thinking this was on the line of an In-N-Out burger place.  This is a sit down waiter service kind of place.  Like their logo being green the theme is carried over into the restaurant.  The aluminum chairs being that bright green and make horrible sound on the floor when moved just the wrong way.  Food   Drink - I had to try the Wahlburger beer.  Well it was blah at best.  My beer app tells me that Harpoon from Boston makes the beer.    Dinner - Name like Wahlburgers I am gonna try a burger.  I was surprised by how few specialty burger they had.  I had the Fiesta burger and it was spot and cooked to order.  They could take it to another level with avocado.  But the star for me was the fresh cut jalapeno peppers, but they had to be some of the mildest jalapenos ever.  Service - We caught them in a shift change but that did not affect their service to our table.  Future -Yes please

-zb40qkqvTorRB0Y8EPqOg.text: This is by far my favorite burger joint.  The burgers are FANTASTIC and the portion size of the fries, onion rings or tater tots is enough!  I like the fact that you are able to take the souvenir cups with you!  The staff is very professional, polite and will go the extra mile to ensure that as a customer, you are truly satisfied. The atmosphere is awesome and makes you feel like you are an "honorary" member of the family.  I am a Texan and I am glad that they are expanding to Houston!  Don't pass up this establishment because Mark and his family have done a spectacular job on the food and ambiance!

uAjjqQXOsakoscX-1OuMWw.text: Pleasantly surprised, my burger was one of the speciality burgers. It had mushrooms , cheese , bacon. I added the Paul's sauce, and this place was so delicious. The burger was delicious, the sides were over priced and not as satisfying.   But 5 star burger on last Vegas strip,

Qi53oJ8QepJ1FAUQ9mG76A.text: I ordered the Fiesta Burger and it was really good.! The melted cheese and the Siracha sauce on it tasted amazing.!!!! It also came with jalapenos and it gave it more of a spice. Their house made lemonade is really good, tasted really acidic but it gave the taste with the burger together even better.! The fries you had to order separate, it did not come with the burger. But still it was delicious.! Not a long wait at all.

okG4lD_yZp1SkXQ3GKCOWw.text: Great place. Came here while on a business trip and was in awe at how fast the food came out for how busy was. When the food came out it all looked great (I got a southwest burger and fries). The burger was great and the fries were good. The wait staff was kind and the ambiance was that if a sports bar (I mean, Vegas baby!). I said all these great things about it- the only reason I am giving it 4 stars is the price point. 15 dollars for a burger is a little crazy in my opinion. All and all you should experience this in your life, it's pretty good.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

U4MrZKmG4F6yoaa_4ANM6g.text: Burgers were awesome! Service was fast and great!! The server was nice and very knowledgeable.  We will be going back again for sure.  I probably wouldn't order the Mac and cheese again, it wasn't bad, it's just different but my hubby loved it!  I wasn't sure what to expect but it far exceeded our expectations for a burger joint!!!

oorZ9OlmuSIT0rjwHGZCIw.text: It's the quality you would expect for $50 in Vegas for a couple of drinks and a burger. This place is the same price point as Gordon Ramsey Burgers and a lot better! Love the customer service, great staff and good food. Most things in Vegas are over hyped and underwhelm you when it comes to strip food. This place is a solid choice for a mid-level burger. Why not five stars?? Mr. Wahlburg, you have failed to understand the significance of quality bacon on a burger. Bacon here is of the fast food variety. Why not charge a couple more $'s and become the dominant burger in Vegas? So, I will be back, I just won't have the bacon.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great burger served with meh bacon. I would go again, just not order the bacon.

LZLqpqiVPaRa7k3QsD9-ZQ.text: Came here with a group of 5 for dinner in a Friday night. We were seated quickly & the waiter took care of us right away.   Within the group we had pretty mixed experiences. I ordered a burger & side of fries to share with my husband. I thought both were very good & decent value for the area. Others in our group got the mac & cheese (very disappointing & an artificial cheese flavor) and the chili (pretty bland even with jalepenos added).    Moral of the story - come for burgers and you'll be happy, but don't stray too far from their specialty.

2FKtDaOFNmpNcdNTPolgyQ.text: Who loves burgers should try this place! I've eaten there many times and can say Gordon Ramsay's burgers are not as good as these once!  The best milkshakes in town for sure!!!! But too big for one person) (that's a good thing) Staff is friendly, food comes out quick and they sell souvenirs right there!!!

XqHoGb7IiXIzDExbNXyATw.text: My boyfriend enjoys wahlburgers a whole lot. We visited Sunday around 1pm and they were able to sit us promptly. The bar was pretty open as well.  He loves their Onion straws and burgers. We also got the Irish coffee milkshake and it was delicious.   I think it's a must try but I was just satisfied but not amazed by their burger and onion straws. My boyfriend loves it and highly recommend it. Come split a burger and find out. I did appreciate how they split our burger for us.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. They can pre split your burger
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Our split burger and onion strings

Iodl5VoyNU5VWbphFOyrNg.text: Quality burger for a great price. My burger was mouthwatering. The tots were just as delicious! Alcoholic beverages also available to order. Staff was super friendly and our server checked on us often. Thankfully it wasn't too busy so we didn't have to wait long at all. Spacious inside and family friendly environment.

7tj_lby8L0wqYUqv1hw0XQ.text: Meh. Solid burger, but overall there's really nothing about Wahlburgers that sets it apart from its competitors. (Five Guys, Shake Shack, etc)  I'm a longtime NKOTB fan and a bigger fan of Donnie Wahlberg as a person. Because of this, I generally support /follow most of the things he does in his career. I've watched all 10 seasons of the Wahlburgers reality show on A&E and started buying Wahlburgers at home as soon as it launched. I actually liked the burgers I cooked at home so I was really excited to finally check out one of the actual restaurants.   I was in Vegas this past week with my sister and little brother. They agreed to go to Wahlburgers for me even though they really wanted to go to Gordon Ramsey's burger restaurant. We walked in on a Wednesday afternoon and got a table fairly quickly. Our waiter was friendly and attentive, but I don't recall his name.  I opted to keep it simple and went with the Our Burger minus the Wahl sauce. (my brother said later that it tasted like homemade thousand island salad dressing) I got fries and a Coke with my burger. My bro and sis also ordered burgers and they shared an order of tater tots. We all liked our burgers, but we weren't blown away with the food. The fries tasted like they came out of the freezer and the tots were too greasy. The burgers pretty much tasted like the ones I've been buying in the grocery store. That's good and bad IMO... because if I can make the same burger at home then why would I want to bother even going to the restaurant? Wahlburgers is just your average, run of the mill trendy burger joint.  The only thing that separates it from the competition is Donnie and Mark's celebrity. That's good enough to draw you in initially, but I'm not sure it'll keep you coming back. It's not a big enough draw for me and I'm admittedly a HUGE fan of Donnie's and the Wahlberg family. I will say though that the burgers are made with high quality ingredients. Wahlburgers is definitely ahead of their major competitors in that regard. A Shake Shack burger could never even touch the quality of  Wahlburgers patty.  The restaurant was clean, quiet and seemed to be efficiently run.  The theme is fitting for the Wahlberg brand and the atmosphere feels homey. Our food took less than 15 minutes to come to the table. I was more than satisfied with the service and restaurant presentation. I was going to buy a t-shirt until the waiter said they were $30! They cost $20 on the website so why would I pay $10 more for the privilege of buying it in the store? That price hike was a bit of a turn off in all honesty, but the free souvenir Wahlburgers cup was an unexpected treat. Overall, I enjoyed the experience, but probably won't go out of my way to visit another location anytime soon. IMO, Wahlburgers is more of a happen-to-be-there type of place rather than a desired destination.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burger was good, but the fries could&#39;ve been better.

lTVmF1Ghu421LdS9Z2eWqg.text: We went in on the Thursday and it was pretty busy but seem like most of the staff was just standing around talking to one another .I myself ate the Thanksgiving burgers and it was the size of a McDonald's cheese bugers, although it was very tasty but priced way to high for the price .i ordered yellow gold french fries and had to send them back twice and when i finally received my second order of fries they still where cold and hard ..We where super excited for this place to come to vegas but i dnt thing we would be returning. 50.00 for 2 burgers and fries ummm no thank you ..

crpHbz1RgHlEP5A7V0kYKQ.text: So the wife took me here for the first time on my birthday. and I must say we were real disappointed. the service was ok but the food came cold my drink was flat all around disappointed we won't be back.

E9idaplMNNjlPWd4qKKuQw.text: Ate @ the Las Vegas Wahlburger eatery today and was far from impressed. Found out from the waitress the restaurant opened just last week so perhaps some of the issues are just growing pains for a new place. Waitress was cordial & attentive, but the wait for my wife's  burger, my ceasar salad & chicken strips for our son was over 45 minutes. Saw two tables just get up & go... tired of the wait.  Food was good, especially my wife's burger, but nothing extraordinary. Two Specialty  drinks were delicious, but pricey... but then what isn't in Las Vegas?  Caught an $8.00 billing error, which they gladly corrected. Total bill was $68 & change. $31 of that was the two drinks from the bar. Overerall, with all the choices available in LV this place needs to cut down the wait time.

6xxATkN6Q6Ocs-3kCJxxyA.text: I want a refund! $120, family of 4. - Y'all should be ashamed if that's what you are serving folks. We love the show - not your restaurant in Vegas! I read another review it was hilarious the guy said the quality control was left in Boston - it wouldn't even matter - I'll never walk into another location. The Mac n' Cheese very sad! My husband and kids could not even find the cheese. I had the OFD the part that actually had sauce wasn't that bad. The fries and tater tots were brought cold, hard and crunchy, they did bring more same result. The Frappes were good extremely over priced! So disappointed, my son said Burger King would have been better! My husband and oldest were hungry as we left, so we had to stop and get pizza! Worst money spent this year!

bbZFWklSClQmmpoLmcx5nw.text: I'm just going to start out by saying that this was seriously the BEST burger I have ever eaten in my life and I love burgers but seriously hands down the best. My boyfriend and I had just flown out to Vegas 4th of July weekend which we so happened to stumble upon a sign that said Wahlburger  on the strip and in both our thoughts we were like okay we are definitely going to try this place while we are here. So we made it upon our selfs Friday to walk there to eat when we got the the place it definitely looked packed which it was the wait time was 45 minutes and we definitely did not want to wait that long so we just decided to go the next day (we didn't realize that it has just opened up)So Saturday we go there and it even looked busier then the last day which it was because the wait time now was 1 hour and 45minutes. Definitely was disappointed but we told our selfs that Monday we have to go there since it would be our last full day in Vegas because we were heading back home Tuesday evening. So Monday morning came and we got up early got ready and headed down to see when they opened (9am is when we went there) we found out that they opened at 11am we wanted a burger there so bad and to try it out that we waited all the time so we could be the first people inline. At about 10am the manager peeked his head out to just reassure to us that we knew they opened at 11 and then i responded to him assuring him that we new but we wanted to try the place so bad we didn't mind waiting because the last two days we had tried to come the the restaurant to eat but it was such a long wait. So finally it was 11 and sure enough we were the first people that got to be seated because around 10:20-10:30 a line started forming. Anyways the burger I got was the O.F.D my boyfriend got the double decker we also got sides of sweet potato tots and thin crispy onion rings and two drinks. We got our food so fast after we ordered everything the service I'm giving a 5 star because even when we were eating people who weren't even our server kept walking up to us asking if we needed anything or how everything was. We could not believe how amazing and good of quality the food was, the burgers were cooked so perfect and I highly recommend to anyone that you need to order the thin crispy onion rings they are seriously so goooooood!! And the most amazing part of the experience is that when we asked for our check the waitress told us that the manager wanted us to have it on the house because we waited all the time till they opened. So good service, great food and I liked the atmosphere also everyone must go! And if we could get one in Seattle I would honestly go like all the time

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thin crisp onion rings, sweet potato tots and the O.F.D burger

3mCZoiWZvPwqdad1EZeDnQ.text: I'm not impressed by the Walburgers burgers at all. On the show, Donnie makes a big deal about the Donnie burger being the best ever. I tried it just to see if he was right. I think he feels it's the best cuz its named after him. The Donnie burger is basically a bacon cheese burger with bbq sauce and jalepenos. The burger is nasty!  Meat is tasteless, the jalepenos are hard and gross. And most of all, they don't grill the bun. You get a cold bun. I'm not even going to try another one being that the bun isn't even grilled. I wouldn't even give it one star but I have to rate it somehow.

OzZDhEp9fR7pX8MoZp5ESQ.text: Huge fan of the show and was super excited to see they finally opened one in Las Vegas. Came around 8ish pm and there was a 45 minute to an hour wait. It was just my son and I and the hostess was very nice and tried her best to get us seated right away, she could see my son was hungry. Sat down after waiting for about a half hour. I ordered the melt and added mushrooms and a fried egg with sweet potato tots. My son got the "Smahlburger" and a chocolate mint frappe/shake. Everything was delicious. Our server, Alexis, she was awesome. Hostess even came back around and checked on us to make sure we were ok. That's great service. I'll definitely be back to try their other selections.

4a_qjkxoWgxSgu1qEX--xw.text: I normally don't write reviews , but let me tell you I ordered the BBQ bacon burger and it was amazing! My husband got the beast then ordered one to go. Amazing! Ps you have to try the onion rings.

bEkpQR3XUU3RxtKbCpoeIw.text: Food was amazing and the prices were great however our waiter, Ross, blew us away. The best service we've had in a long time!

oNG1XwnSjBXo-OWBn6bBXQ.text: My husband and I went to Vegas for our honeymoon.  We sat at the bar and was immediately helped by Vincent.  He gave us our drinks right away and answered any questions we had.  I had the macaroni and cheese with bacon, and the onion rings.  My husband had the melt and fries.  All of the food was great!  We will definitely be back!

a5_1PJX_fYBrVQtmR_hgWg.text: Loud, noisy inside.  Burgers delivered to wrong table, took way too long, and were cold!  They were also missing the bacon we asked for.. geez.  Above all else they were meh even if they arrived on time and warm.  On plus side wait staff was friendly and apoligetic.  Skip the hype, go elsewhere

FaAEE6wp7IjajHHzr7hdfA.text: The service is absolute trash! The waiters and waitresses know nothing about customer service. It took us 20 minutes to get a table because all the hostess did was talk to her friends and never bothered to seat us. We waited an hour for our food only to find out they lost our order. No one assists you and the workers just talk and mess around. Definetly the worst service ever and not worth the money!

qG2MiTQhVXDRj3zhBMabhg.text: So I go to Vegas with my young son and we see Wahlburgers.  My son and I decided to go there.  We were seated promptly.  However we were not acknowledged for at least ten minutes.  I ordered an our burger medium no onions.  My son ordered a BBQ bacon burger medium.  My burger was rare inside.  I waited about five minutes before I could get someones attention.  I finally had to call out a waitress who walked by.  When I explained to a waiter what I ordered he got a little snippy with me. Saying that medium was pink.  Anyway the waitress came over and apologized and had another one made for me.  When the bill came I put down money and I actually got short changed.  I had to explain this to another waitress.  She quickly gave me the difference.  I don't think the staff pays enough attention to the customer.

ff-Sy0G3YaOj4xE8m-08oQ.text: The Bartender was great! The food was very disappointing. The burger fell apart in my hand, making it a very messy meal. The onion rings would have been a lot better if they had been cooked long enough. I do not recommend. I really do like the show and wanted it to be a lot better experience.

4GesxU0aInB1bfqcpDHYUA.text: Seating was quick, but the service was atrocious. Family members recommended this place, so I was expecting something completely different. The only thing my husband and I enjoyed was our burgers which is really a shame, reason for the 2 stars.

81g5u90scGWPQhrn6B0ayw.text: Burgers were delicious and lived up to expectations. Could have used more wahlburger sauce. Onion rings were different (thin) and sooo good! Too bad the wahlburgers werent present.

foCJh9VLBmdimFLBANkpKg.text: Just didn't have the quality food expected for the price, and the service was just way off par. My waitress talked to us maybe three times total and had to ask other waiters for help. Not impressed at all and as a local will not go there again willingly.

aECru6iR_mpCGbPf1w4dnA.text: I have to admit when I first got my burger I didn't think highly of it. The bun was oily in my hands and the tiny tomato slice and tiny onion slice had slid off. BUT let me tell you, while eating it you wouldn't find me complaining let alone talking without a mouthful of burger. The bun (brioche style? soft, sweet, and a bit chewy) and beef were delicious. I had gotten an egg on top instead of cheese which made it even tastier. Though I do have to complain to Wahlburgers and all burger joints ever, if I say no to the cheese you put on your burgers and ask for something else listed alongside that cheese in terms of price, don't charge me extra. Jesus us lactose intolerant humans will someday revolt, it just doesn't make sense. The reason I'm not giving Wahlburgers more than a three is that their sides are basically garbage, don't bother. Tater tots? Make these at home. Onion strings? Gross, trust me.

wotApLZ09RRHj2CflfyNOg.text: Definitely not worth the hype. I got the bbq burger and was expecting a big burger covered in bbq sauce. But nope. Just a tiny little burger, with basically no sauce on it. The cheese wasn't even slightly melted, it was actually on the cold side. Our bartender was terrible. Barely gave us any attention even when we tried waving her down. My boyfriend also got the bbq burger and they cooked his burger wrong. All in all it wasn't worth it. As a local I'd rather spend my money elsewhere.

LOwO8i6xOTgjZlrtq7N1-Q.text: Truly not giving it ONE star to be an idiot. Really feel when you add it all up, its not worth more. Horrible wait time, average ambience, food is NOT good at all for the price and would NOT be worth a repeat visit even if 50% less.  In Dorchester, maybe this flys but in this city ( a mile long ) of 35,000 places to eat, 10000 of which serve MUCH BETTER hamburgers, this place was almost funny to me. No b.s. THE most average nothing hamburger I have had almost ever in my life, including a bowling alley hamburger... Save your money and 60 minute wait time and go ANYWHERE else. Truly wondering what the F Paul is doing on the show when he pretends developing recipes and whatnot because this isnt even remotely restaurant worthy. I pray the food here is just the F U menu and not the real quality served at main restaurant. Literally wasted calories and considering taking up Bulimia due to this lunch.

oWFzmDTO6SBh8fFxaHARZQ.text: Ok so why not, it's not a burger joint we have in Fla, and it's by the Whalburgers, so .. again I ask you, Why not?  We opted for out door seating as the afternoon was quite nice, and it allowed us a chance to people watch. I chose the sloppy joe - no whalburger sauce. the boy chose some other burger to his liking, a drink for each and fries to share.   The service was good, infact quite fast, what I didn't enjoy was the person who wanted to take our "free picture" that just annoyed me .   The food was tasty, I loved the Sloppy Joe, and managed to eat it without getting any one me, That's a huge feat, you have no idea!  The Scotsman was a member of the clean plate club so yeah we liked it. We'd come back.

lZYhoYcRyDzZ31K10WZJ-g.text: Service was slow and inattentive but the server didn't seem to be busy or have many other tables so that had me confused. I had the fish sandwich it was pretty standard with nothing special. This is the first restaurant I've been to that serves sandwich entrees with no sides included?? The portion sizes are also quite small. That was disappointing. The price of the food was too high for the quality but I understand you're paying for the name and the experience. The taste of the food was good but as I said nothing g special. Best part of the experience was that any drink you buy comes with a souvenir cup.

mSQncjoAAfp0umG4uQEDCg.text: I must be honest, I was not expecting much from Wahlburgers... I was expecting an average burger only popular because it's owned by a famous family and boy was I wrong.   My boyfriend and I stopped in during our staycation walking the strip and, as we were craving burgers, decided to give this place a shot. Despite the full looking restaurant, we were seated quickly and received our drinks in paper cups (surprising for a sit-down restaurant, but charming). I ordered "The Our Burger" (when in Rome, am I right) and my boyfriend ordered the O.F.D. with a side of tater tots to share. let me make note, i do not like American aka "government" cheese so I wasn't really sure how i would like my burger but we were both blown away. He went dead silent from the moment he took a bite and when he finally came up for air all he could say was, "wow". Mine was also amazing - juicy, flavorful, perfectly cooked. and the tots were the perfect amount of crispy!   Driving the the strip is such a pain but i'll definitely be returning!

3JyGQoG8Vl234_XDYo-6Mw.text: I'm a fan of the reality show as well and I happened to be here so I had to try it. The server as well as the hostess were both very helpful and friendly. I got the Mac & Cheese (no, I did not get a burger) but the dish was delicious. I went with 3 other friends, all of whom did not want to try this place and they all had burgers and said it was the one of best burgers they ever ate so it was positive all the way around. I also had a Chocolate Strawberry shake which was so good and tasted exactly like Chocolate Covered Strawberries... plus I got to keep the glass which was very cool! I would love to try more items on the menu so I will have to check out this place again!

UKFqqbE1olH-6Lhupd7c1Q.text: Okay food but expensive which I guess is expected for being on the strip. It would have to be the only place open for me to go back

-50mqAegCGzFeeIdDuA2bA.text: This place is a bit overrated. I think the prices are a bit high for what you're getting. I wish you got more for your buck. We sat outside because we were going to a show and didn't have a whole lot of time to eat and seating in the inside had a 20-30 minute wait time. It took awhile for anybody to come greet us and get us drinks, which was pretty disappointing. When we finally got to order, we didn't have to wait too long to receive our food. I got the Thanksgiving Turkey Burger which was actually pretty delicious. I wasn't sure about the squash on it and it being a turkey burger, but I have no complaints about it except that it wasn't big enough! My boyfriend had the Mom's Sloppy Joe and he really enjoyed it. The onion rings and the sweet potato tots were pretty good too.

-8fBhZTAGZcI_21hjj1Qig.text: Party of 8. No outside drinks allowed in.. prices were average on the strip .. the tator tots , side of ranch and the strawberry lemonade were big disappointments.. but everything else was great freshly made and our waiter was greatness .. he even mentioned I would not like he ranch and brought out the signature sauce with it for me ... we would for sure eat here on the strip again !!

k7H0gPHBBdpAYcvYa9_n1g.text: I was extremely disappointed today! The burger had NO flavor! The best part of my meal was the fries! I've been dying to get to the one in Long Island, NY. But, I'm gonna pass now! I LOVE Donnie, Mark & Paul!

03zcJK-w-Tfwa2L0grxJhw.text: it was ok i thought it will be good but it was not like they show on tv n i wish they put chesse on my burger n it was cold n did not taste good either

E5DyIVPI-ONZfUBtiym6fg.text: Best onion rings, great burger and fun atmosphere.  Great food, great service, great prices.

ezisMqdP3duVY5HebXZVeA.text: Pretty solid spot! It's definitely a tourist attraction and they give out free cups for their sodas and their milkshakes. My friend had the BBQ Bacon burger and she loved it! We also shared the onion rings which were great. As a vegetarian, I had the kid's Mac and cheese which was honestly awful but this is a burger place so I really was not expecting much. However, the shakes here are amazing!!!

Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Kids mac and cheese with fries

EQLpEkv8xuFJkD5zGGI2JQ.text: Too bad Mark wasn't there! Lol but seriously the waitress was awesome and our food was incredible. Worth every penny I had the bacon and swiss burger which was delicious and the root beer is by the bottle. They have sweet potato tater tots!!!!! Doesn't get better than that. And regular tater tots! My favorite burger place in town! U must visit, keep in mind the building is small but serves nicely and all their cups are take home souvenir cups with free refills!

xOj7jezQxU855PBjVYRbVg.text: Awesome addition to the strip!  Who needs shake shack now that the wahlburg brothers have opened up their Las Vegas outlet right in front of Ballys.  This place is awesome!  If you have had burgers from back east this place takes the crown.  Great family burgers, fries, sides, salads, other sandwiches and frappes (shakes) and floats!    Everything is fresh and damn good!  They have a rep to protect and even during mock training this place rocked on service and good quality!!!  Once they start the engine going this place will rock and be one of the best additions to sin city's burger wars.  Move over shake, Ramsey, fufu waffle & gimmicky burgers - the kings have arrived!  Awesome meat, shredded lettuce, house made pickles, and this awesome Chef Paul's signature wahl sauce.  Guaranteed good stuff.  They are gonna turn on west coasters to their east coast good food and hospitality.  This place rocks!

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. How many quick service burger places have a full bar in it! This is awesome!
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EOKBNe8vRTFGrR_-cbzBxQ.text: Came here specifically for the Impossible Burger, a newish vegan burger.  It's not on the regular menu yet, but it's on the napkin dispenser display.  It's not cheap - $19, and comes with no sides, and I got a Diet Coke which was $5 (with a plastic souvenir cup), plus tax and tip, so my whole meal was $30.  Not cheap, but it's Vegas, and I was willing to pay a little more to try the new vegan burger.  The display shows that the burger comes with special sauce (with mayo - not vegan), and cheese, and sauteed onions (not sure what they are sauteed in and forgot to ask).  So I asked for the burger vegan style, so they took off the sauce and the cheese, BUT the bun came with butter on it!  Also, not sure if the bun is vegan, and not sure if the onions are cooked in butter or oil, and not sure if they are cooked on the same grill as all the meat patties.  I ended up scraping off the buttered part of the bun with my fingers, and removing the onions, and adding some ketchup and mustard, and the burger was very tasty after that!  Don't get me wrong, I LOVE that they are offering the Impossible burger and want them to keep doing that, but, please be aware that vegans may come to this restaurant to try it, and they will want the rest of the burger to be vegan as well - bun, toppings, sauteed onions, etc...  So it'd be great to educate the staff about these customers and make it so you can offer a True vegan burger, and include the details on the menu about it, from the top of the bun to the bottom.  The waiter did tell me that the burger is cooked on a separate grill, which I love.  Now you just have to offer the option to make the rest of the meal totally plant-based.   Place was bright, service was friendly and quick.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. They have the vegan Impossible Burger, but topped with non vegan toppings

P-Ruf7hoDQQL37Zl5VyJTA.text: My husband and I really enjoyed the food. Tyler our waiter was really attentive to our needs I strongly recommend this restaurant.

WZeg3d1bzSbleqgxpO5zSw.text: Let me just say, the local management and district manager have been overwhelmingly apologetic for the action of 1 rude waiter. I really appreciated that they took the time out to call me and listen to what happened. Hopefully, he is in a position that suits his personality better.  The last time we are here, the food was great and the beer was cold... it's an exciting crowd and you might have to wait but have a drink at one of the bars, back in this fun little cove.... it's worth the wait.

kAOVpJvToH-aoY2RvDcUBA.text: Yeah I watch the show and that's what drew me here. But I was pretty disappointed with the overall get for what you pay. 2 of there specialty drinks - moonshine for me, and I forget what my wife got, which were about $12 each?? a jack and Coke ($6), and a cheeseburger ($14?), and Mac and cheese ($8), with tip it was about $62-4. Nothing was that great. Burger was actually kind of dry, not very juicy. Good location. Though with a lot of other stuff around.

CmhJRSX5eO-E281UYZQC0Q.text: I really like this place honestly I'm pretty biased because I'm a big fan of Mark Wahlberg but the burger that came out was really great the meat tastes and looks like real beef the vegetables were fresh the tater tots were money enough said

DJpAlDD2A1LCuS_eyu30-g.text: I had the hamburger it was great.  Would highly recommend them. The onion rings are just strings. French fries nothing new.  The Mac and cheese was from a box with the batter from the onion rings on top. Was not good. Do not order it. You get to keep the cups that you order coke or ice tea.  Prices no different than any other place.  We would all eat there again

QFcAVoEHn9Bzi60it6FYbg.text: It was my first time at this restaurant and I ordered the thanksgiving Day Sandwich and it came out to me cold. Not even room temperature, but cold. And this sandwich is not cheap. It's $13 just for the sandwich- no fries included. I upped it another star just because I told one waitress it was cold and she gave us our bill then another one asked if we wanted an adjustment. At the minimum they refunded us the money back but I definitely won't eat here again.

bCTChA-IRZF_zdMyd3huXQ.text: Waited almost an hour for a burger not worth the wait. I ordered "The Melt" it's a grilled cheese with a meat patty in the middle. I've never had a grilled cheese that I didn't love and unfortunately I only remember how bad it was. It was very dry!!

gJjuuF4rrvi06zXjgJ4rMw.text: My only experience at wahlburgers sucked. We had a party of 4 and 2 kids. Of course my kids made a mess 2 seconds in the restaurant and the waiter was really nice about it and cleaned it up quick. My husband and I were so excited to try the burgers because we do watch the show! I asked for medium well for my burger and when I got it it was pink but looked past that and all order of fries were cold so we asked for fresh ones. not once did the waiter tell us the fries or any side orders were extra charge. So we finish eating and our bill comes up to be almost $80 for 2 burgers and a kids meal. And we saw they charges $15 for fries. My husband asked to speak with a manager and all she said was that Fries are an extra charge and doesn't come with our $13 burger. We refused to pay for the fries and she had to get her manager and he said the same. No apologies no nothing. We were there for about 20 min going back and fourth about the charge for the fries and they end up taking 1 Fries charge off. Still refusing to pay the manager comes back with SECURITY and a new bill with all Fries off our bill. There was no need for security when he didn't show us the last bill before he called security. The management sucked the waiter was extremely nice but could have let us know side orders are extra. Overall everything on the strip is overpriced period. But my burger was pink when I asked for medium well and they are overpriced. My Fries were cold and tasted as they've been sitting out for a while. Fries are overpriced for a small container. Fountain drinks are almost $4 so they are overpriced. Save your money save your time as well.

osoQmz-DjqMe28IN7VKRhw.text: This is a great place to get a yummy burger and fantastic customer service. I like my burgers on the plain side, flavorable, but not so juicy that the bun is wet. Their burger was perfect for me and Paul's sauce is super. My friend had the turkey burger and she said it was the best. The shakes and specialty cocktails were good too. The best part - the customer service! Our waitress, Alexandria H. was awesome. She visited with us, was attentive but not intrusive. We will definitely return to this burger place on our next trip to Vegas!

M_qzoCJsCkqTZ5WEOIgxDA.text: Was excited to come here but was very disappointed ordered a bbq bacon burger and got no bbq sauce and our fries were stone cold won't be coming here again

IhZRIBZynGNdC4OiV7hvuA.text: Long wait time and so-so food. Would not recommend. Was expecting much better. Oh well, gave it a try.

7B39XnK8em1pnFxuo66k_Q.text: In love with this place! Prices were good, food was amazing and we were sold when we read "government cheese" on the menu! Plus not having to deal with kids is also a plus. Great place to eat and just have a few drinks and relax!!

VOs0tC_grJOJ70IOLSv7_A.text: We watch the show and are fans of Donny and Mark but dissapointed in food and service. They sat us at table where sun was beaming on us so we decided to eat outside. I ordered Mac n cheese the top of it was good the more I got to the center the drier it became. Hubby ordered dad burger which was nothing special. Won't be back.

i63xNLUoMv8UmEEbbM5m2Q.text: The burger was good but small, price for the burger seems to high since you can get a bigger burger in other good joints for a similar price. The house sauce and the homemade ketchup didn't provide much difference in flavor. The restaurant had a good atmosphere.

uBBeZjq9ZTrgoAJEAEEInw.text: A big fan of the Wahlbergs and watched the show faithfully, so needless to say I was excited to visit the restaurant.  I was initially put off when our waitress at the bar was so dismissive and super unfriendly.  Being our first visit, when we asked questions, she was very short and only gave yes no answers, didn't make recommendations or offer up anything. All the time were speaking to her, she was looking around and doing other things totally seemed uninterested in providing us any type of service.  I ordered the BBQ Bacon burger with BBQ sauce on the side, fries and a drink. My friend ordered The Our Burger with bbq sauce and Tater Tots, specifically asked for lettuce and tomato. She took our order and immediately walked away. She didn't ask if that completed our order or anything, when in fact my friend wanted a drink. While we were waiting on our order another nicer friendlier waitress came along and asked if we wanted a drink or water while we waited.   Our order comes and my BBQ Bacon burger was a bun, with patty and 2 jalapenos. The burger was supposed to have bacon, cheese, avocado spread and bbq sauce. I sent it back. It came back with more jalapenos only. I sent it back again and told them to completely do it over.   My friend's burger came out with meat, bun and signature wahl sauce. It WAS supposed to have lettuce, tomato (I mentioned earlier that she specifically requested lettuce and tomato), "government" cheese and housemade pickles. She also sent her burger back. She got the burger back, still no BBQ. She asked for BBQ and the 1st waitress brought her clearly what was ketchup in a cup. When we told her that is ketchup, she proceed to argue with us and tell us that "this is ketchup (pointing to the bottle), we don't have ketchup in the cup only bbq sauce!" We sat the ketchup she gave us and the BBQ sauce that came with my burger side by side to show her the differences that one could clearly. This waitress had the never to say, we make it homemade, so it a bit sweeter today. Seriously! As this conversation is going on I see what appears to be a manager and tell him about the service and the ketchup issue, he apologizes and keeps it pushing. What has happened to customer service?  A gentleman sitting near us ordered the sloppy joe with no onion strings...his sandwich came piled so high with onion strings it was incredible. He was so disgusted and kept shaking his head the entire time he pulled all those onion strings off. They offered to make him another one, he said never mind because it had taken so long to receive the messed up one.   Once we finally got our burgers right, they were very good, but the service left us unimpressed and not wanting to return or recommend. Just think this place has only been open for 6 weeks. This type of service usually doesn't happen this early in the game. I told my friend, the Walhbergs need to do a drop in on this place as the staff here is ruining the brand.

bO8Z3mTOjBi7ATDYxt_76A.text: My daughter and I were on Vegas from Nashville to see Reba and she loves Mark and Paul so when she saw the sign, flipped out.  The service was friendly and timely.  She has the sloppy joe and I had Mark's burger but on a salad.  Both were excellent.  Mark's burger i s really tasty and healthy. I highly recommend it.  We were very happy with our experience.

2I6eHYmHFctb6rtgtxtUPA.text: We ate here while on vacation because my daughter and I have been wanting to try it. Food was excellent and place was clean. Are waiter was fantastic. The food took a while but that is expected for a new place they are still learning and will get better but our waiter kept checking in with us letting us know will be a bit. He took 20% off bill because did take a bit and we did not expect that at all but that is good customer service. Will 100% go back.

MUZglUmDO6270u6om6EWRw.text: Very poor not good at all not worth the  money or the time.. I came from California to Lasvegas to eat this place! And it was not worth it ppl in there was not nice and the food was under cook never again I will go back here also I did speak with the manager his name is Edgar he was horrible he was very unrespectable and did not understand how me and my family felt they gave us undercooked food and I told him about it and he said they're sorry and that there is nothing he can do about it he didn't even offer to make my food again. Don't think he should be placed as a manager or that position of that kind of him not helping people the way how it is meant to be a manager I think Donnie Wahlberg kind of did better with his employment and stuff he needs to come back and take care of things I don't think it's right for them to give undercooked food to cook too customers! I give this place a thumbs down it is not worth taking your time or your family to this place I rather eat McDonald's then here sorry... Just speaking the truth

gKmkOVwpnxU4A8Mp6oggTQ.text: Wow, best dang burger!!! Get the beast, omergerd!!! This is the pot of gold at the end of a dark and contaminated rainbow.  After a long night of being humped and grinded on by degenerate girls full of plastic and daddy issues, this was my nirvana.  It tasted better than the silicon titty that was in my mouth the night before. I only wish it were in Dallas.

KBlMgMKyBeVZWDijusaKIw.text: had the Caesar salad with chicken it was probably the best salad I've ever had first time here nice restaurant nice environment definitely coming back for sure !!!

aWk7Bsid7QwKPPKXJVgKvA.text: we got there at 5:30 pm and the two very young girls working as a hostess advise me that there was a 1 1/2 to two hrs wait ... ridiculously there were more than five empty tables ... you could see the line cookers lining in the counters doing nothing ... no pending orders... the patio was practically empty wet no people making line or waiting... hostess keep walking in and out playing tag or something I am not sure if they were waiting for a tour buss or maybe they Wahlburgers makes their money selling air, maybe they are just posing or advertising Boston burgers in a fake restaurant...who knows ... I am 52,My first time in Vegas, fan of Mr Wahlberg, thinking I was going to get a famous hamburger and get back to San Antonio TX and brag about it, or maybe make my friends jealous in FB about having a wanna be legend burger... but thanks to two dumb little girls I lost my chance, and maybe I will never have that chance again, I told them I was going to write a review on it ... and I got the Whatever look... well here it is their one Star I wish there was a minus but there's not. For now I guess Famous Texas Whataburger takes the trophy. Mike Wahlberg may not even care ...but we do...!!!

QmfpNITaRLLgswR5Y0YsdQ.text: My husband and I were visiting in Las Vegas and heard that Wahlburgers had just opened recently. Knowing that we are fans of the Wahlberg family we thought we would give their location a try. I have to honestly say that the burgers were just plain average, nothing really to write home about, but the fries were cold as hell. The shock came when we got the bill, $49.85 for 2 burgers, 2 fries and 2 fountain drinks. We were in utter amazement. We would have rather gone down the road and picked up Burger King, McDonalds or Carls Jr. instead as the taste of those burgers are far better IMO. For the amount of food, quality and price, this was simply highway robbery! Needless to say we will not be returning...

KVXRRJZfXwzaETBy1rES2A.text: We sat at the bar Saturday morning.  The service was quick. Our drinks were refilled frequently by Emma, the bartender.  Our food was delivered faster than expected.  The restaurant and bar were full by 11:30.  The bun was fresh and the hamburger was good as well as the tots.  We will be coming back once a month.

-OdHu7V1XTTmjfNN1g60yQ.text: Total morons work at this place! Hostesses and the one male host are terrible. They have no clue what they are doing and haven't been trained properly. I wanted to try this place but because of their rudeness  left!

kKKP89VbURXANOJkitwy4Q.text: So disappointing. The food was not good & the wait was long and the service was terrible. They really don't want you to sit out in front where their tables are. But we were able to talk them into giving us to go bags that don't even have any W's on them for wall burgers. Definitely not kid friendly so don't plan to bring your family & Bring lots of money it was quite expensive for some hamburgers

0X-qXIN_y9126DsV_HghMA.text: I was really excited to try this place, and unfortunately, it was very disappointing. I ordered the Thanksgiving sandwich. The server asked, "With everything?" and I said, "Actually, no mayo, thanks for asking!" Needless to say, it came with mayo. Normally, I'd just scrape it off, but that also would have scraped off the butternut squash and cranberry, leaving me with a plain turkey burger. The server immediately saw when she walked by and brought it back to the kitchen. I didn't see her for about 20 minutes, when she brought the check. My husband had long finished his burger, which I told him to eat, no use in having a cold burger, and I figured it wouldn't take long to bring back my order. I informed her I had never received my sandwich, and just at that time a guy wandered by with it. By this point, I was done and ready to leave, and she removed it from the ticket. Very poor and disorganized service.

q-PJ0eF-4fmNo8xd3SBn9Q.text: We've been there twice in the last three days I've gotten the double decker twice and I love it so juicy just so good. My wife got a shake it was good. Tots where over cooked to crunchy for my liking. Can't wait to go back again.

eLhVeyqUnzJIP73RMtZ6yQ.text: I love this place, I've been here 4 maybe 5 times and have never been disappointed. From their burgers, to their salads, to their sweet potato tots to their fruity Moscow Mules. You can get any burger and/or sandwich turned into a salad, whatever their secret dressing/sauce they have is delish! Their sweet potato tots are my favorite, can't go here without getting those. The atmosphere is awesome, the customer service has always been great and there was only once when they first opened that I had to wait to be seated/helped.  This place is easy to get to if you are staying on the strip or just simply on the strip. I work close to the strip and we decided to choose this place for lunch and it was not easy to get too, definitely was a mission. Safe to say I won't go out of my way again to eat here. If in the area, absolutely! My boyfriend and I stayed an Bally's and ate here several times because it was close and yummy! Prices aren't terrible but anything on the strip is going to be pricier than off the strip.

aCWrurSacqLH1ZfAfvBFPQ.text: We were headed to visit a friend at Fuel bar across from Wahlburgers and decided to stop and grab some food. I had the Thanksgiving Day sandwich/burger which was awesome! It's hard to make a turkey burger take on so much flavor and it was one of the best I've had. Boyfriend had Donnie's favorite burger and enjoyed that. We split fries, onion strings, and tots which were all amazing. We're locals so the price was not really shocking but not something we like paying for two burgers and a couple sides.  Hey, it's Vegas, if you don't have a vehicle, it's one of the best burgers on the strip!

GNWnLjbF4bko3HzXdGq2Hg.text: Wahlburgers is a unexpected delight. I was with friends that wanted to try them so I went along. The Our Burger was excellent. Meat cooked to ordered and the bun was tasty.  The service was fast and friendly. I would come back again!

OYePgbLQfLQLsMhrX7AKgg.text: The food was good, great tasting burger. Miguel, our server was incredible. He went over and above. We have travelled the world and eaten at a lot of incredible places and also some not very good places. He is easily top three servers we have ever had. If Wahlburgers employees people like this all the time you will be in great shape. Hopefully this young man manages his own store one day because he gets it.

FMXCmlL5yenXcicus8JaAQ.text: Here in Vegas and had placed eating at Wahlburgers on our top 3 must-eat spots. Sorry to say the disappointment while here was staggering. Walking in no one greeted us, place was filled with employees that seemed to be in private conversations with each other. We were finally seated at a sticky table top booth which ended up having trash collecting under it. Frankly, there was lots of trash on the floors and under the stools at the bar. Next surprise was the menu, it was missing the one burger I traveled all the way from California to devour, The Beast! I had to settle for the double decker and the Bbq bacon burgers. Burgers were just okay but they looked sloppy, tasted bland and our stale overcooked fries had no flavor.  Not worth the $35 we regrettfully paid. We really had hoped for so much more. We came when Wahlburgers first opened and loved it but just a couple of years later and let's just say we are shocked that Paulie hasn't shut it down and started over. The many staff members were unorganized and preoccupied with each other so they never checked on us. We even witnessed a member taking a shot at the bar before delivering a customer's drink. Some employees wore gloves and some didn't in the kitchen but no one wore beard guards even though many have long thick beards. We couldn't figure out who was in charge so we couldn't complain. We ate what we could, paid the bill and left. Please save your time and money. Skip this place until the Wahlburgers family takes a deep dive into its operations and brings it up to its family's top standards.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Late night snack in Vegas baby!

z8uYnyTP-AbNMF7ubYuf_w.text: Marky Mark did not disappoint! We ordered the The Our Burger and the Sweet Potato Tots. The burgers were cooked exactly how we asked for them and tasted amazing. The tots we had were crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside, perfect! Service was also on point.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QqQ5XonQWz3ZEnq7wzNcJw.text: I server at the bar asked if I wanted fries with my burger after I described what I wanted on the burger. I asked if it comes with it and she said we just have regular fries, giving me every indication they put it on your side and I must have missed that on the menu. Since I wasn't really looking for anything else to eat, I wound up eating about 1/5 of the fries and then the bill came with a side of fries that they regularly charge. I asked her why she didn't mention from the beginning as I didn't ask about the fries in the first place and got a dumb look and a shrug. As if people visiting Vegas don't already get screwed with overcharged items, resort fees and taxes here is another moocher working at Wahlburgers and giving me a great reason not to make a second visit at this chain.

lrAxCuT_s9C7KkR7F8j14A.text: You can skip the wait time by sitting at the bar, faster service anyways because you have the bartender in front of you taking your orders. The burgers were good. The locations by the strip so its packed, but we conveniently were able to grab a quick bite before our show.  Its a bit overpriced however, then again everything in Vegas is overpriced

zPh20Y1jGuIGd_hyA-sGVQ.text: We were not sure what to expect. Just because a restaurant has a celebrity name does not mean it's good. We were pleasantly surprised how good the burgers are. I was really impressed that they offer any burger on their menu, chopped up and put into fresh mixed greens. I like that they are thinking about the health conscious, low-carb crowd. Service was excellent too!

7tRDShxIE6Xewu3ILC7jog.text: First time here. We came just because I'm a huge fan of the show. We barely waited for a table which was great. They accommodated my father who is in a wheel chair. Loved that! Everyone was friendly and helpful. Wee asked what they liked best to help us make our decision. It's weird getting a new paper cup for every drink but I know Paul made that decision from watching the show. I will definitely be back.

7vnMtZtF9RALR1kqOkffNw.text: I was Sooo disappointed!!! I had been wanting to eat here since I was a fan of the show especially their Mom.  So of course I ordered the Mac and Cheese inspired by her and who doesn't like a good gooey Mac and Cheese?  Well this was neither good or gooey!!! In fact it hardly had any cheese in it at all. Tasted like dry cooked Noodles that weren't even salted!! I asked the girl at the counter if Paul or his brothers had been there yet and she told me they had not been there since it has been open. Maybe that's the problem or they should hire a quality control person!!! It was the worst!!! So sad!!! Now I can't even watch the tv show because I know now it is all just a gimmick!! ( btw Herbert Keller was at his restaurant) Disappointed!!!

mrZC6v3SOhBIOzTkUFjmvg.text: I had the thanksgiving sandwich and sweet potato fries. They were both mighty tasty; overpriced, but tasty.   The service SUCKED. Never received the sauce I asked for. Twice. Had to ask for a water refill - never offered to refill drinks. Ugh. Boo. Blah. Won't come back.   Also it was very difficult to access and had no restrooms on site. Save yourself the bother and $80 and just eat at In N Out.

zGW0i6rZ_osf6mma6A7hrw.text: Went here on a whim, glad we did because the burgers and onion frizzles were so good. Now I have to make trips to Boston just to get it when I'm craving it, very pleasantly surprised with our food.

0GyFfrYNqpbJ_a-f5li2Rw.text: This is my go to place every time I'm in Vegas.  They have great dishes as well as sides. The BBQ bacon burger and mac N cheese is delicious! The food comes pretty quick and the service is great. Not to mention, the fast and efficient service from Rodrigo the bartender. He is kind, friendly and attentive.   Overall, the food is excellent, good quality and large portions. This place is a MUST try.

F-h5ASeaCiRteB9g6h74uQ.text: The burgers taste so fresh! I got the original Our House Burger and it was excellent. Made to order upon request. Would definitely come back and would recommend to a friend.

cUlf8XXR3T_lHuiKttKO_w.text: Great food, fast service and awesome Bar!! Even though it was the first day that they open, They were so organized and on top of things that we thought they been open for a while.

Y_o-b4EjINA-vmr5BUP4mw.text: I was super excited to come here and I was let down for sure. The waiter was subpar he was in consistent, lied, laughed at my friend when he, the waiter got the order wrong. Service was awful and the food was not even worth the price. It was any other burger. Will never return again.

krpKQUkOVH7smTZWEEhJlg.text: I really don't get the hype around Wahlburgers. If the name wasn't so well known I don't think it'd be as big as it is.  We were walking the strip and I insisted coming here for lunch, as I never seem to make it to the newly opened one in Detroit and heard good things about it. There was a wait, but we were able to sit at the bar and not have to wait for the table. Bartenders ignored us for practically 15 minutes then played it off like they thought we were still looking at the menu and said "are you ready to order?". Really? Our menus were put down on the bar 10 minutes ago. To be fair, after that, service was much better.  We split the double burger and tater tots and ordered 2 beers. On the menu, the double burger sounded like it was big enough to split. That was not the case. For like $11 you get a burger smaller than a Big Mac. Flavor was OK, but the bottom bun fell apart making it really messy to eat. Tater tots were lukewarm and tasted previously frozen with no salt. Would not get again.  What's weird is 1) there's no bathroom inside 2) they have photographers who come around snapping pictures of couples, printing it out and bringing it over hoping you pay the million dollars for it.  Would not go to again...any location.

XkIx8CcKaDANfVX9yPuxaA.text: I had been wanting to try out this place after having watched the TV show. Stop by for lunch and had The Our Burger with some fries. The burger was nothing special, it was good but didn't wow me. I think it was rather small or maybe I had a big appetite. They do have some salads and cupcakes that looked delicious but didn't try them. They have a lot of workers but don't seem organized, it was a bit slow.

nzDWSBIapyswoYeTuVIQ1g.text: Famous restaurant... typical high prices food is pretty average but your on the Vegas strip so it's common... very fast paced restaurant and and I felt I was being rushed by waitress

ChfBgfATbCNZw18K5SabSw.text: The Our Burger was Ok. I didn't really get a good flavor. Not impressed with the bun. The pasta salad was one of the best I've ever eaten. But,  I went there for a good burger.

DTmW1wWonKiwjnnMwQbf1w.text: If you're looking for a fresh, tasty all American meal, look no further! We found the best spot on the strip.   We had 2 "The Our Burger" and they were a good portion of meat, lettuce, tomato, cheese, pickles and sauce. You can taste every flavor in every bite.   The thin crispy onion rings is made perfect! They're red onions and they taste so good.   You can order to go too. I saw a lot of people doing that and we're happy to just try these amazing burgers.   Yes, they're new...yes, they're busy, but so is every other restaurant in Las Vegas.   Give Wahlburgers a try, you won't regret it.
