fiRQT0RPSXhU-t_74bA_jg.text: Was excited to check out this place. The burgers was delish and service was quick, wasn't disappointed at all. The crispy onions rings was yummy. Really enjoyed my burger. Price was reasonable. Would  definitely come back again.

5GjYnAudD7YMTMUVeTUh6Q.text: Nothing special abt the place. Ordered Chilli which didnt taste like chili. Onion rings was red onions. Definitely not going back

42CLh6EvNuhM3hsC2-f5cw.text: We went to Wahlburgers in Las Vegas the first time and liked it so much that we searched for it back in East Coast! Yep, we're that kind of crazy when it comes to food! Lols I thought the menu is slightly different between the East and West Coast but they still have the Wahlbergs' family favorites ie: Mom's Sloppy Joe, the Our Burger and the single, double and triple burgers. Tried almost each type of the burgers and they're all pretty consistently good! Juicy and tender! I just wish they're a little bigger on the size.  Service for the LV location was excellent! Super friendly and very attentive staff. Being it's a tourists destination, they offers guests to have their picture taken and put it in a souvenir frame. But I think it's a third party that take the pictures since the pictures are not free. But feeling tourist-like, we bought the picture.  Ohhhh, when you're there, do NOT miss their thin crispy onion rings!!! It will be a sin if you don't get this crazy-good thin crispy onion rings! It's not the ordinary onion rings. I think they should be called onion strings instead of rings. They are thinly sliced strings tangled and fried all together in a delicious batter. Did I say you have to get the onion rings?  Hahahaha it's definitely one of major factors why I had to find a Wahlburgers back home. Definitely recommended! Oh, try the onion rings!

iNY-X5h03F8TKpoirMzLXw.text: Glad i finally had the opportunity to try Wahlburgers , since we don't have one here in Houston. I ordered the "Our Burger" and i added avocado and it was so delicious it tasted like a real homemade burger! The fries were pretty good too! I had a Pina colada to drink which comes with the souvenir cup to take home which was pretty cool. It gets super crowed as i expected but it was worth the stop. Hopefully we have one soon in houston

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Rk7aZpX2nSfdiboi0en9Mw.text: I've been to a Wahlburger's once before (in an airport) so I really didn't feel like I've had the full experience, so while in Vegas I decided that I needed a burger for lunch, and it had to be a Wahlburger.  Located in that shopping/dining area outside of Bally's, it was pretty easy to find. It has a nice bar connected to it in front and I imagine, if there was any particular sporting event you'd want to watch, this would be a good place to see it. Me, I just wanted to eat.  My waitress came, was super friendly and we chatted briefly about Drake, which was great, then took my order.  I started with their smoked bacon mac n cheese. Good Lord was this amazing. Penne pasta, smoked bacon, "government" cheese (per the menu) a mix of other cheeses, with house made parmesan panko breadcrumbs. I should have just stopped here, because this was really all I needed. So delicious and satisfying, but of course I had more because, why not?  My burger was their O.F.D. which is a  1/2 pound burger, Swiss cheese, bacon, sauteed mushrooms and their tomato jam and a side of tator tots. The burgers come cooked medium unless otherwise asked, which I'm totally okay with a medium burger. The burger was huge. Much bigger than I anticipated even though I knew it was 1/2 pound. I couldn't finish it! It felt slightly undercooked for a medium, but it was still tasty.  The service got a little spotty. Other waitresses kept checking on me, refilling my cup and such. Getting my check was kind of a pain.  Overall things were good here. I'd come back and would recommend Wahlburger's to any burger fan.   Oh, and make sure to snap a picture of you and the Marky Mark cut-out that's there.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yoCxh0pzrvKOj8TPLU6C9w.text: Already knew Wahlburgers was great!  Awesome food and a great atmosphere.  This review is to call out the excellent service we got from Emma when we visited the Vegas location.  She was super friendly and knowledgeable, recommended great drinks and took excellent care of me seeing as it was part of birthday celebrations.  Thanks again Emma and Wahlburgers!!

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Happy birthday to me! This pink Lemonade is AMAZING!
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I mean, this picture says it all!
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Order the fed or pink drinks, you won&#39;t be sorry!

HMENFfloRZMxlyTjayQHIw.text: We totally did not connect that this restaurant was related to Mark Wahlberg until we were inside and confused by the million photos of Mark and his family.  Anyway, I got the Impossible Burger which was the hefty price of $19. It didn't even come with fries... This is a meatless burger, by the way. But I have to take into account that this is a Vegas Strip restaurant, so the prices are going to be a little exaggerated. The food itself was delicious! We also had the fries and onion rings. The onions rings are more like curled onion strings, as they were super duper thin. However, they were all cooked evenly and spiced well, and served in a large portion.   I got a cute, green souvenir cup with my iced tea. It's pretty durable and has lasted many uses later at our house. Wahlburgers is okay for a strip restaurant in my opinion.

G9w3tTAvhPtj7Q8YRdFNlQ.text: My husband and I each had a Wahlbowl. They were really good and priced well. Service was great.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bbq beef Wahlbowl

XXRFOxZUsotdU0hxEpbqaQ.text: Burgers were super good and decent size. They sat us fast and didn't waste time taking our orders. Only downside is how small the location is and how it's set up.  If you're sitting near the bar when it gets crowded, you will definitely have every single customer walk really close to you when eating. Meanwhile, on the opposite side you will have the people who are ordering hovering over you. In conclusion, food is great but try to sit far if possible.

WfEFy2nr4Mr4bQ6NWZAVPQ.text: We ate here after our day at Drai's Beachclub. A few of us had eaten here before but it was on my list of places to definitely eat at. The burger was so good. Juicy and flavorful, the bun and toppings were chosen to perfection. I also ordered the sweet potato tots which were also amazing! Service was great, the eight of us sat at the bar because we wanted to sit inside and didn't mind and would rather sit at the bar than wait the 30 minutes in the August heat to be sat. If Vegas wasn't a good capital of the world I'd definitely eat here again. I'm hoping a location will open in Arizona one day!

e3p-WvPjSHL5dcaabmKxKw.text: This is a great restaurant and Diana was a great server and did an amazing job!! She was very helpful since this was my first time here!

oBymFhfbbu1BdCu1VD01ZQ.text: The food comes out pretty fast not bad for a burger joint. burgers a lil pricey to not come with fries also a low grade quality of bacon

EvBLEJ0Gy--ZuoCIMszH0w.text: We enjoyed coming here mostly for the experience of coming to the Wahlburgers restaurant. The food though, was great. We got the double cheeseburger with the special sauce. It was really good. We also had a Caesar salad that was great, really crisp, fresh romaine lettuce.  A gal came around and snapped our picture and made a postcard out of the picture and gave it to us as a free gift.             I liked seeing the pictures in the restaurant of the three   Wahlburgers brothers and their Mom. Knowing they all have a great relationship with their Mom and all treat her so well made me want to support their business. It was a fun experience and a great meal. I'd go back again when I'm in Las Vegas or at another location.

8PEFW_3jFKEleG7sr-NnKw.text: If it was possible to give no stars i would have.  where do i begin?  first of all this Place thinks it's a high-class joint they have a maitre d' with a walkie-talkie and they gave me the absolute worst possible  table and I'm not sure why maybe it's because I didn't bring more than one person with me and I was alone I waited over an hour for a burger and I was completely abandoned by all the staff I got up and I thanked the manager for the tea and left. do not go there. they think they're special but they are garbage and a shit hole

JA6IaoxZyeRzlbb2ExGTIQ.text: Service was terrible. Waited 30mins for a table(which I understand) but then took 15mins for someone to come to the table to greet us. He took our order (drink and food) then we had to ask for our drinks 20mins later. Then 30mins later we finally got our food and he brought one of our guests her "burger" without a meat pattie? That's not a burger. Thank god it tasted good at the end.

lMd2xtbQXu4q_k6flgTbRg.text: I looked up wahlburgers on yelp to see if they do takeout orders, and of course it said yes. So i called to confirm and yes again. We wanted takeout to take back to our room at Ballys cause it was too hot out.  Once we got got there i informed the employee that we wanted to order takeout and he came back very rude and said we dont take out i explained to him that i had just called and they confirmed that they do.  We were very unhappy about this cause we are huge fans of the show and did not get treated well.  I even DM the Wahlbergs on instagram about this.

SgHuXRXdMLS84OYjwUoyXw.text: Very disapointing. Burger too small covered by a huge bun. Overpriced! Would rather have in-n-out. Affordable & good. Will not return. Onion rings were terrible.

tDEegP-cHK7gC-9efkbgkg.text: Well i went here to see what the fuss was about....we got seated pretty fast and the was the fastest of all the service! We finally got someone to take our drink order which was a soda and a beer, the soda came after 5 mins but had to wait for another five for the beer....which was a canned beer and a thin plastic cup so your beer gets warm fast...so i thought the waitress that took our drink order was going to take our food order but she left and never came back. Finally a new waiter came after waiting 15mins took our order, 2 burgers and a order of onion rings...well we waited for another 30 mins for our food to finally get to us by another waiter. The food was good...the burgers are small but good not the best...dont know if worth the price 45 dollars for 2 burger a side of onion ring a soda and a $5 beer...oh by the way a waiter neer comes back for refills on your soda you have to go get it yourself...so really no need to tip...i might give another try but not first on my list

These are not meant to be plain Jane burgers. I will go back before I leave.

Definitely not for locals. You have to go through two casinos to get there from parking. The sides arnt included. For me and my son the bill was 32$ bucks. Not worth the effort. MenjHWMBPvBsE1VzOIX8jA.text: It's all hype. The burger was nothing special sweet potato tots were good but half burnt. The staff was horrible. Very unorganized in getting seated and 3 tables seated after us got drinks and food long before us. FYI no restrooms in building you have to go out to shops next door and their nasty. Then try getting back in. You are at the end of the line and host wants to reseat you. Way over priced. 2 people     2 burgers 2 sodas. $56. Go to in and out burger a much better deal and better burgers. And staff appreciates your business

sqN5eZ5SR68yc3ZiwehZ2g.text: I had to go to Wahlburgers when I arrived in Vegas. The location was cool and it was crowded but no wait. I ordered Donnie's favorite, The BBQ bacon using a turkey patty and it was delicious. Everything I excepted. I'll be back in 2 months when I go back to Vegas.

FPIS9Q1NyGm2etO9HEwp_w.text: The burger was amazing. We were not hungry but really wanted to try one and split one. It was so good we bought a second. The service was slow but it's only its third day open so I am not surprised, they are obviously still learning. The staff was very friendly though. Will definitely come back my next visit to Vegas.

8-ggOx2A_G9NpwrcsgxXaA.text: We have watched the shows and now we have enjoyed the food. The hamburgers were excellent just like mom would make. Definitely coming back

_9Ic_zEIUEuwWtWyL0aAbg.text: Only waited about 15 min to get seated and service was great. That's about it. 50 bucks for 2 burgers and a soda and a beer. But what do you expect it is on the strip. The burgers were ok nothing to get excited over. Will not make the trip just for their burgers.

NQvlhq9KYzBX87gPJUyuVA.text: Actually expected the food to be subpar, as this is a celebrity restaurant. To our surprise when the food was actually tasty! Expensive for what you're getting but really a good burger! Would probably eat her again if in the area!

_LaZMR5K9s-TmWYaomTKjQ.text: Supper bummed! We paid 80.00 for 4 sodas 3 burgers and 3 fries. The but was good but nothing to run back for and the fries were awful.  it made me really sad because I am a huge fan of the family! They all seem to be great people so I was surprisingly very disappointed.

YDQi6mMgg76_dK9y4p70KQ.text: Vegas Baby!!!! Yeah, we stopped here after some major shopping at the outlets!  All the walking made us hungry for some meat!  We ordered The Melt......delicious, greasy, wonderful!!!! Added extra mushrooms.  We also tried the regular burger, fries and onion rings.  Fans of the fries, but would not reorder the onion rings.  Not what we were used to.  These are very lightly breaded red onion "strings".....We also ordered the Margaritas.....just average machine style frozen....low on the alcohol content.  We tried the pina colada...better than the Margarita...but not great.  Just go with a coke and drink alcohol elsewhere!  Otherwise....loved the Melt!!!!!

OwZYrkZ9XHRhI0Lwb4A_WA.text: LOVED IT!!! At around 6pm on Saturday night the wait was only about 20 minutes. They get your phone number and text you when your table is ready. My husband & I both had the Our Burger and my sister had Dads Basic Burgers all of which were cooked perfectly! I strongly recommend the Mac N' Cheese with Smoked Bacon. SO GOOD!! Our server (I wish I could remember his name) was great. 3 burgers, 2 sides of fries, 1 side of tots and the mac n cheese all for about $60. Not too bad. I'm a local so I will definitely be back!!

6dpXEv3Q4HxGxbOzEAhyFA.text: No Bueno tried it not what I thought for i'm famous celebrity that's trying to do a good burger old lines plastic beer glass not clean cold burger won't eat again oh forgot to mention overprice

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

RZTEFDy9G8H-viXP4UAVNA.text: Amazing experience! Staff was friendly, service fast and the food was fresh! Burgers cooked to our liking. The Yukon fries are delicious but the Sweet Potato Tots are tops!  Loved the food and service so much, went back the very next morning for breakfast! Best burgers in town!!!!!!

Y4YA-WHip3-7n4y3pw4Q6g.text: This place we awesome. Quick seating, great staff, and an awesome burger! Order a Mexican coke for extra awesome.

BxskWzEcHWp94q2MBnOolg.text: I went for lunch and love burgers on the grill taste, so I ordered a cheese burger with onion rings. The service was slow had to several times ask who was waiter  but it was busy , then waiter showed up friendly and took our order. Our order arrived and I took a bite and it was like biting into a crisco lard sandwich. I like some grease on my burger like the next guy but the grease was just to much. Then on to the onion rings, if that's what you want to call them,  they are more like broken tree branches fried in oil. The waiter brought the check and noticed I didn't eat the food and offered to talk to the manager, who didn't charge me, and that's what the rating is for as they were great about it but the chef wasted the other 3 part of my star rating.

TfMdoA6fBslywxgEc2aPQw.text: Sucked major weiner and came out cold, I thought it was going to be great because all my sisters and my mom watch the show. The staff was really nice, but I had to wait too long to be seated and it wasn't worth it. I won't be back, but what I will do is go to bobbys burger palace or chef ramsay's burger or burger brassiere or Guy Fieri's so basic any good burger place in vegas. I honestly don't want to be back, but I may give this place another try if someone begs me. It's not that the cold food wasn't okay, but that's all what it was bland and just okay. It's just seems worst because there are way better places near it that serves  burgers right.

NqsOGRt65vPaY2zFUogxmw.text: So glad this place opened up. I've stopped to get the triple deck burger here both times I've come to Vegas in the past year. This past time it was super crowded, but we were able to find seats at the bar. Courtney took care of us. She was super attentive but not overbearing. Both the food and service was 5 star

Aqhq-yCaPZNntcMhogIMnw.text: I love coming here after work on the strip! Courtney, the bartender, is super cool and always friendly! Great people. Great food. Two thumbs up.

kXxI167kWktN-p_mcN2fyw.text: Had a wonderful time and really enjoyed our bartender, Liz, she was great! Would  recommend going and sit by Liz, she will take great care of you!!

154U42EyD2ptPLwO58LwDg.text: The burger is a little small but what do you expect on the strip. I had the bbq bacon (recommended from Ronnie at the bar) It was extremely flavorful, very tasty, and the fries have a great season to them. Coming from a company that strives on customer engagement, Ronnie at the bar had a great suggestion, great customer service, and a great personality!

7SBUNpSIX4G00ObhIMtQ5Q.text: Tried checking in thru Facebook but it couldn't locate it.   My daughter and I both had the Our Burger and split an order of Sweet Potato Tots.  It was okay.  My bun was a little soggy from the grease.  I really couldn't tell it had a special sauce on it.  Overall the food, service, etc. was fine.   It's not a place I'd specifically go back to eat but would if we were in the neighborhood and someone in the group wanted to go check it out.

uwLD_Q9RYo1lU1EYTjX-eA.text: We went on 10/6/16, the service was great and a good atmosphere, here is the but, the food was very underwhelming. The burger looked like a McDouble at McD's and the MAC n cheese was missing the most important element the CHEESE. The prices were to be what is expected I guess for the Las Vegas strip, our tab with tip was $52 for 1 double burger to share, with fried onions, fries, Mac n cheese and 2 beers.  We watch the show and thought there would be some heart in the food like the family.  Maybe Paul, Mark and Donnie need to pay this location a visit.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Half of a double meat bacon cheese burger, not very impressive.

wb0zAobVVLfAcML1rUedTw.text: Great service considering how busy they were. Food is delicious and tap beer is ice cold like it should be. Burgers are extremely tender and juicy. Definitely a must if you're in the area.

ZwmKzXS8ENUYmVWN6fbG_Q.text: Many options in Las Vegas for celebrity restaurants and went with Wahlbergers because I like thier show; however does not translate to a great restaurant. The servers were a little rushed and not friendly. Got the BBQ burger and came with no BBQ, when I tracked down a different server she basically asked what I wanted, like who cared... Food was ok, over priced for burgers and everyone agreed everything was just ok!

Mdche_rGks6I7rWYuSkD9w.text: Definitely one of my favorite places to eat! Great burgers fast service. Love how you can totally customize your burger how you want. Always a must when iam in Vegas

zgy1spUZ0SeyolNEq1WBRg.text: This was literally the fastest service I've had at a restaurant ever. It was a little off-putting that everything was paper/ plastic (silverware, cups), but the food and service exponentially made up for the bad feeling I got from having single use glassware (lol). I got the portobello mushroom sandwich which had melty cheese and MORE sauteed mushrooms on the sandwich. It was phenomenal. My grandmother got the sloppy joe which was open faced, she said it was incredible, and my father got the Wahlburger which was perfectly cooked and he raved about. Server was incredible. They were busy and our food was out in less than 10 minutes, and our drinks were out in less than 5. I've had Taco Bell take longer than Wahlburgers. Nicely done

MjwfmAsKtL_OncjIJqQvIg.text: The burger is good, good ratio of meat to bun. I had the original single patty burger (Our Burger) and it was $10.95 (just for the burger). I personally think its pricey but for the strip I guess it isn't bad. The Wahl sauce is amazing! Like an upgraded more creamy thousand island. I asked for more and used my fries to put more onto each bite of the burger hahahaha.   The fries were good but it was a small cupful for $4.95. My bf got the Fiesta Burger for like $15 and it wasn't all that special.  We ordered those 3 items and it turned out to be about $31. It is a sit down restaurant surprisingly... I feel like it could work as an order and then pick up restaurant like Shake Shack but I guess they want to make it extra fancy.  I like how there are a few add ons that you can add for free like fresh jalapenos, tomatoes, wahl sauce, and  sriracha mayo. So I got a couple of those on the side.  It seems like a lot of people here like to get those souvenir cups for their beer and soft drinks and there are discounted refills!  Okay burger, nothing amazing or too too different, but worth a try! Expensive for what it is but not for the Strip.

3EpOWoqQMtS8rysf67U5TA.text: I ordered the impossible burger. If you aren't familiar with this burger. Get familiar. It's basically impossible that it isn't meat. It tasted great and much healthier than real meat. They don't have vegan cheese for the burger and you need to say no mayo if you want it to be a True vegan burger. Also advise be careful about all the sauce and extras because if you are going to eat a vegan burger. The tater tots wet too crispy. The wait for food to go or sitting down takes a bit. It's a pretty busy place but the burger was good. I think this is a great place to stop if you need a fast food type meal. Just remember you will pay $$ for this meal. Vegas ain't cheap and this place is definitely $$$

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Impossible burger and tater tots with free water ($25)

CTsHikDDqbv4qJftUzHPrA.text: Came here for lunch during CES with coworkers. I started with the sloppy joe and fries. I found the sloppy joe to be very bland, so the server graciously swapped it out for the original burger, which was delicious! This is a must try in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original burger
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mama&#39;s sloppy joe.. kinda bland and delicious fries

gE7u9VWudNgHTv2FRoSuhw.text: The price forced the star rating down. Albeit, it is Vegas; but on the other hand, this IS Las Vegas we're talking about - there are far too many alternative food options to waste your hunger on dribble.   The burger is pedestrian at best, and worth no more than $6; Ol' Marky Marky and his funky burger bunch'll charge you nearly double anyway. There's not enough salt, not enough decadence, and the burger is too dense. This "government cheese" motif got carried away with itself, and now your payin' Hollywood prices for "government meat" too; do we ever know what's in our burgers? I know what they all say, but who knows?  I'll tell you something though - I don't know how these goofballs did it, but their sweet-potato tots are a stroke of fuckin' genius! Give me a bucket of those, a handgun, and a masters collection of Wahlberg movies, and I'll show you a Saturday night proper!  $15 in on a burger and tots, and immediately I forgot the burger. Those tots will haunt you though. Why didn't I think of that!?! Oh well. They're building one in Kansas City this summer, so I'll keep you updated on whether they're price-gouging Vegas tourists, or if they're in-fact across-the-country delusional. Fat Burger down the street does it better for less money, if that's the sort of thing you're into. In-N-Out's customer service and flavor simplicity decimates Whalburgers - and against Whataburger's flavor and value, it's not even a contender.  Kansas City is already oversaturated with great burger options, so we'll see how quick they shutdown; if they bring that same nonsense I wasted my stomach on in Vegas to KC, It'll be swift and uneventful. I stopped in Alabama for my first Whalburgers, and they told me it would be an hour and a half wait!?! What? Not for a burger. No sir. Freddy's KC makes a spectacular steakburger, Chicago dog, custard shake, and a basket of fries in 5 minutes - In-N-Out does that in half the time. Step up your game, Son.

4KllB7lPRvx2BBaepPYS9w.text: I took my family to Wahlburgers on our last trip to Las Vegas last month and it was very worth it. Their burgers are delicious as well as their sandwiches. They have a kids menu and serve salads as well. You can go there and have a great time with the family or go with some friends, sit at the bar and catch a sports game. Staff is polite and attentive. Their menu will crack you up, but I won't tell you why so that I won't spoil it. Parking isn't the greatest here so you'll probably have to park at Bally's Hotel guest parking and walk to the restaurant. It could get very busy depending at the time you go, I mean after it is Las Vegas. Good food, good desserts and good drinks!

1HTmKV9Qf4DGcccgAVftjw.text: Location plus ambiance and then the food. Great. The service was prompt and friendly. Perfect spot to grab a great tasting burger at a reasonable price as well.

pjgTwKxSVd4u9mjH8xQCVA.text: Good burgers and good service drinks are priced right. Definitely love the breakfast burger is my favorite.

gmasv-GjGVWGhoPLhnOKcQ.text: Great mid night Vegas stop to sober up, the thin crunchy onion strips were amazing, and I got the classic burger. Super good

HrW1YFfIFihysm6-3X3mzg.text: I was kind of disappointed in the wait but the burger was really good. I gave it three because of the person who attended us. Wasn't very good welcoming and seemed like they didn't like there job.

QhXCz82FQ0NcIoRKyVPuDA.text: Always wanted to try a burger from here and I finally did! It was late on a Monday night on the strip and it was still packed. We found seats at the bar and ordered the food came out fairly fast for how busy they were. They did forget our fries but we got them very quickly after we said something. The burger was delicious and cooked the way we asked for it. Very flavorful and fresh. Will be back for sure! Staff was friendly.

R_sAzR2x4nj62mCl7zfbGQ.text: I was torn between 2 & 3 stars due to really liking my meal.   They have a fantastic veggie burger. 2 of us had it & agree it was delicious. 3 other really liked their burger. My husband said his was cold.  Here are the negatives:  Way overpriced. All burgers come with nothing. Most were about $13. However the veggie burger was $19!  Sides were $5 & were not as big as you would think for the price.  Soda is $5.  All drinks are served in disposable looking cups. I can't imagine all the garbage being created.  When we were there the service was a bit slow. It took awhile to get drinks, then awhile to place a food order, then about 45 more minutes to get the food.  So even though I enjoyed my meal. I can get equally good food for less elsewhere.

Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Not sure if the soda cups get washes or thrown out. &amp; why give us lids &#34;?

aLIFKGzSs2uq8xw2hTlO4Q.text: First time here ! Love it. We are staying at the Bellagio Hotel and were waking around outside just to find something to do. There are so many good options in Vegas, so deciding what to eat can be hard sometimes. We stoped here and asks if the have any Vegas options. The hostess recommended the Impossible Burger which was excellent! So delicious! One of the BEST veggie burgers I ever had. The restaurant is nice and clean. Friendly staff. The bathrooms are outside under the stairs. I'll definitely give them a try!

ofJWDcZVho6yTLCOrmkWeQ.text: The wait was ok not too fast not too slow. The place was not so occupied at the moment. It just took so long for the alcoholic milk shakes. The sweet potato tater tots came out quick, but they were nice and hot. The burgers took a while to come out, but did come out as ordered( medium for the Double patty burger with Paul's special sauce)  but the sauce was not the greatest I ever have tried, but not a bad burger, it just felt like I could of paid less since it was not so special. Because this is a chain of the original it might be missing something. My friend has the bacon cheese burger and that one was pretty yummy. The place seems more like a good old regular Sports bar and Avril with a lot of Wahlbergs movie posters all around. No bathroom you have to walk outside, and it's more like if you passing by and want that quick burger type of place. At least for this location.

Sd-Z2qE_ZFKRWpjsCo1ZDw.text: This place was a sad disappointment. I ordered the classic double decker burger, medium, with the house sauce on the side. The burger buns were dryer than the Vegas desert air. They pretty much broke apart in my hands. On top of that, the patty was overcooked (and also dry) and the sauce was on the burger. Three strikes with this one. When I told my server their buns were dry, he brought over his manager who said "that's the way they are supposed to be." I wish I was joking. I actually felt belittled! What American doesn't know about burgers and buns?! Well, this one does, and buns are not supposed to flake apart like a poorly crafted sand castle. Gross.

ACSoy2TyopnnHH3d6aUUwg.text: The last time I was here it was 3am on a Saturday night. This time I came here again because I had this huge debate whether or not we ate here before. I had my old review to prove we indeed did eat here. But round two here we go.  We came here during the day and there is a massive wait to dine here so one of us left our number with the hostess so they would text us that a table is open and ready for us while we stroll around nearby. I recommend grabbing some drinks at the Sin City Brewery which is around the corner about 500 feet away.  This time I got the SuperMelt which is pretty much the grilled cheese and a burger combined into one. This would be something I would recommend anyone stopping here to try.  If you're looking for some spiked milkshake, they have a menu for that as well I think you may need to request if they don't give it to you with the regular food menu. I got the Mud Pie which they put vodka, Kahlua, and chocolate liqueur and coffee cream in with vanilla frosting and Oreo cookie pieces. Very satisfying while getting some alcohol into your system.  Overall, this was a better experience and I'm glad I gave it another shot.

VE6jPpHq5OYyl_GKQGUqJw.text: We had the best server at Wahlburgers today - Diana was so friendly and helpful! She has the best smile and was so welcoming. Food was great and atmosphere was fun. Highly recommend.

QsoD5HAgyHwN_pcbzfaSYQ.text: If I could leave no stars I would worst experience ever I order 2 impossible burgers so first I was told there would be an up-charge which not a problem but then when they screwed up not once but twice that's an issue. So when I ask why this is on bread and not a bun like the first time it came out I'm told "oh it's the size of the patty" but then when you look at the other burger there's no patty really I'm lost! So when I push it aside now I'm like whatever my meal is ruined and the server sends the manager over and his first question is what's wrong with the food? Well the first time it came out it looked amazing but it was wrong and now I guess that because I sent it back and have waited an hour and half still hungry yet to have eaten and it come out looking like someone just slapped everything together because they didn't care and the one burger didn't have barely anything on it there's the problem and I'm not eating the food and came in to eat and he looks at it and is like I see what your saying let me make you another one why so I can sit here for another 30 mins. Yeah I'm good but here's the kicker he doesn't even take the food that I didn't eat off my bill, wait he adds a discount oh did I tell you I still ended up paying for something I didn't eat. Yes that's right I did!!! All I have to say is WOW! The discount didn't even cover the food I didn't eat. Come on as a manager you should just have removed the two burgers I didn't eat and sent me away hungry and angry and I would never had left this review but you didn't you made me pay for something I didn't eat so here is my 2 cents regarding this restaurant! The lesson here is don't make a guest pay for something they didn't EAT!

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bill

_O7Y4PoUBmrKcbSkGWwZQg.text: The food was amazing! We went on Friday night - it wasn't too packed, we were able to get a seat in about 15 minutes for a party of 6.   The vibe was really cool inside.  It was one of the best burgers I have had.  Very clean. The staff were extremely friendly.  I'll be back!

US98K_5WmLTFTMakQ2XalA.text: We have been to this location several times and always experienced great service and food. This time it was not the case. When we got to the hostess desk we asked for a four top in a booth since a member of our party has back issues. The hostess outside said ok it would be about 15 min. We were called by the hostess outside while the hostess inside with the purple hair was giving away our table. We could see they were talking and struggling to figure out what to do. When asked if there was a problem the hostess with the purple hair refused to admit she made a mistake and the other hostess asked us to wait inside,  where we were then told by the hostess with the purple hair very rudely to stand out of the way, she finally came around took us to the table, threw the menus on the table and walked away. We then watched her do the same thing to table after table, no greetings, no telling any one your server will be with you, just tossing menus and walking away. I realized it was a Saturday night in Vegas but the music was so loud, we couldn't hear our waiter much less each other. As alway the food was great, just disappointed in the service tonight.

y_AmNEHUQ7QcY0C1zlELaw.text: It was good but some reason the next day I got sick. Wasn't a good thing. Diarrhea and then I threw up was like that all day and evening. Now I'm trying to eat regular food now to ease my stomach. Just make sure you order a well done burger so you won't get sick. Might not go back don't want to feel like it again. In bed all day along.

NDXBoHVkCXu4Jw8POHQfqw.text: Cold pre cooked disk. Tasteless sent back and the only thing warm was the bun. They don't know how to cook impossible burgers  my daughters burger was also cold. Onion rings over peppered strings and cold as well

fP0TKmlaABrAGkiWEx1Gcg.text: Very good burgers and overall experience!  I love watching this show and it was a real treat to visit one of their restaurants. The burgers were good - I got Donnie's favorite and my boyfriend got Paul's favorite. We got sweet potato tots and enjoyed the experience. It wasn't outrageously expensive like most places on the strip, and we were both very happy with the experience. The decor was neat, featuring the Wahlburg brothers accomplishments. I would definitely recommend this place, especially to a fan of the show or NKOTB!

Xx1OUoX7H3M1hHebmkjFqw.text: Love this place!  William is fab!!! Food was delish!  Pork Mac n cheese is too die for.  Lemonade cocktail of the day . Great energy.  Food was hot and correct we loved the experience!  Will definitely be back!!!  I love William (dollar bill)

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

RX_EC0Pw0z4jk1ilqlgG8w.text: Thanksgiving Turkey burger was gross!! Does not come with any sides. They are all almost 5 dollars each. I had to sit at the bar, and the fan was blowing so hard that I had to tie my hair back so I wouldn't eat it.   Stick to Red Robin and their endless yummy steak fries. Burgers taste way better there. And it's half the price!

F1LPHEylF6HKoWnmxSQvBQ.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this place.  I went on a Friday afternoon and was able to get a table pretty quickly.  Requesting first available, we were seated outside (with decent fans in the heat) within about 10 minutes of checking in with the host.  I had the Our Burger, and it was particularly good with the melty cheese and signature sauce.  It cost a little more for $13, but that's not a bad price for a decent burger on the strip in Vegas.  The french fries were definitely big enough to split between 2 or 3 people, and they were just the right amount of crisp on the outside and soft/hot on the inside.  I would definitely get either of these again on the next visit.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fries and tots were pretty good
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Our Burger
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fiesta Burger

5Qtea6pI-JLIBixRDdvC8A.text: Wahlburgers located in front of Bally's in Las Vegas is a surprisingly good burger place. I actually think the burger is nearly comparable in quality to Shake Shack, which remains my favorite Vegas burger joint. For me, the primary difference is that Wahlburgers features a significantly higher price point. I am convinced you are paying a tax for the Wahlberg name. While I do not consider this to be the top burger joint in Las Vegas, it is a worthy place to grab a bite, particularly if you are in the middle of the Strip and don't wish to trek towards the outskirts.

ltjOlgErgCqfSUWvHT98QA.text: WHO: The hubs and I :)  WHAT: Dying to get out of the 104 degrees of the Vegas Strip.  WHEN: This past Saturday!  WHY: Because I had a massive crush on Marky Mark as a kid. DUH!  Over the weekend, the hubs and I decided to try the famous "Wahlburgers ", as we were both in need of a meal after walking the strip and day drinking. Upon walking in, we were greeted by a young face and lead to a booth close to the bar. We dove into the extensive menu before deciding on sharing "The Our Burger" which was loaded with a 1/3 lb of meat, lettuce, tomato, onion, american "government" cheese, Paul's signature Wahl sauce with housemade pickles! Ben likes his burgers plain and simple, where I like to make mine all fancy and loaded up with all the fixin's - so opted for onion rings on the side....which were pretty much onion strings! Everything tasted a little blah - and wasn't outstanding by any means The meat was pretty dry and literally was nothing to write home about. Service was decent and pricing wasn't terrible, but I wouldn't go out of my way to come back.  #sorrynotsorry

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

tn0C0ob97SS-jCkHxhkLRA.text: We decided to try Wahlburgers, since we had heard good things about it. We sat at the bar for immediate seating. The bartender was very charming.  I inquired about protein style burgers since I am not supposed to eat bread. I was told that they place the burger on a bed of lettuce instead of wrapping it in lettuce.  I decided to give it a try with a double burger. When it came out it looked like a chopped salad.  This seem too surprised both the bartender and me.  He told me that they usually just put the burger on the lettuce and not chop it up and mix it.  I would have preferred the way it supposed to come. My dining companion ordered a surf and turf darker. It was definitely on the light side with the lobster. The onion rings were indeed thin, as we were told they would be.  They were shoe string onions.  They did comp my "burger salad", as it was not what it was supposed to be. That was a good move and the right thing to do. We will be back but I will be much more specific about my order.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Onion rings
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Surf &#39;N Turf
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. There version of protein style.  A chopped salad.

aaqiKSIWkng5BJbA4-UFKg.text: Good burger and beer is hard to find.  Too bad they aren't local to me.  But I definitely will be stopping in every time I'm near there.   Service was attentive, a lot of beers on tap and the burger was sooo good I crave it.  5 stars for all around clean and well run restaurant.

iieA2Y3hLNrbVNmhV4vWQw.text: Second time here.  Food is always great.  Service is excellent and servers are friendly

aYzIi8UecN9R1AriCKpIog.text: This brotherly chain of burger joints actually has some pretty good food considering the kitsch factor. Right off the strip, it's a convenient place for a quick bite or a late night snack. The burgers have a bunch of different style choices and are cooked well with a nice juicy flavor. The beer selection is pretty good as well with some local craft brews.

8HBh2fEzAxLNBWGzOrRTmQ.text: Super Disappointed! I've wanted to try this place for a long time and it was underwhelming! There were 5 of us and all of the food was at best lukewarm... my boyfriend said his burger was cold! $65 for two burgers, one order of tots and 2 beers ( 21 oz and 32 oz) is pricey! To top it off the plastic cup that our beer came in was apparently ours to keep but I would have liked the option to not pay for a plastic Pilsner cup with a Wahlburgers logo on it

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

aWDPZggHEYmR3vwUHitotg.text: Came here for a late night greasy burger, and I got just that. Don't set expectations too high and you will enjoy your experience. Don't suggest the onion strings, no substance, go for the tots instead. I ordered the double patty burger added grilled onions. Service was great, very helpful! I do recommend if you have greasy burger expectations.

W_94I1DuT_ycGeT-SgiYCQ.text: Burgers delicious!! Beer over priced! Ranch dressing has a vinegar taste. Very disappointed

7GYCx2-grzRMUY6PhzlzjA.text: Like many other people, I love watching there show, so yes, this was one place that was a "must" when going to Vegas, I was so happy when they opened there location right out side of Bally's.  You have the option to sit outside, at the bar or inside of the resturant.  When we arrived we were offered the outside high rise table, we asked for a table inside, and we were lucky, no wait, seated within one minute. Good timing. We went this past Friday evening, when we left they had a huge line.  We started off and ordered off there WOHLCOCTIONs menu- We ordered 2 Pina Colada's- made with cruzan coconut rum, island oasis pina colada, whipped cream, topped with a fresh pineapple and a pretty flower.  Full of flavor , and perfect amount of liquor ratio to the drink. $10 each From the menu- Husband ordered- double dogs- 2 all beef hot dogs, choose your toppings ( yellow mustard, spicy brown mustard, housemade mustard, ketchup, sriracha, relish, saurakraurt, raw onions) $9.95 I ordered-Marks Favorite "Thanksgiving Day Sandwich" freshground seasoned turkey burger, stuffing, mayo, homemade orange-cranberry sauce & roasted butternut squash (I chose to omit the squash) $11.95  We shared a side order of tater tots  Service was excellent, food came out hot, and delicious. Happy we tried Wahlburgers. If your on the strip, I would recommend, they have something for everyone.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wahlburger Family Photo in the resturant
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Double Dogs- with toppings
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cardboard cutout of Mark in front of soda machine.

LNepxfV-RlONcRl_QLRkfg.text: This place was recommended to us, so we figured we'd give it a try. When we arrived, I thought it would end up being just okay. Nothing seemed special, but was I wrong!!! My vegetarian wife had a yummy impossible burger. I had one of the best burgers of my life (better than yesterday's burger at Gordon Ramsay's).  My burger had horseradish aioli, arugula, maple butternut spread, and crispy onions (I asked for no bacon, cheese, or pickled onions).  Customer service was also outstanding.  Highly recommend!  We decided to no repeat places in Vegas, but we may break our rule on this one.  Food 10/10 Ambience 7/10 Service 10/10 (my wife says 11/10) Price 8/10 (sides and drinks add up quickly) Portions 10/10

qspPrRtx3XYo552iND6DRA.text: Wahlburgers was really great. The burger had a lot of flavour and was a good size portion. We also ordered the onion rings as a side. These are definitely to share as it's a big basket of thin onion rings but they're really good. Really glad I tried it out.

qizBLdLyYb6EV7N-dVaTCQ.text: Great food!!  Great service!!!  Cold beer!!  Way overpriced but it's the strip so I get it.  We will go back and eat here again.  It's not the best burger on the strip by far but it's pretty good and a good atmosphere.

RRaHSnYHPvIBPk-HxWM39A.text: One word: EPIC. The Mac & Cheese with chicken was perfectly creamy, not your usual thick and dry Mac & Cheese! The drinks weren't expensive either. My partner and I had a main each, a side each and some higher-end alcoholic beverages for $50. And it was delicious. Dakota, our waiter, provided us with *by far* the best service we've received in America ever! Can't wait to eat every meal here for the rest of our trip.

GMERmIDWmpQSQf47NaubQA.text: This is my 2nd visit to Wahlburgers while visiting family and friends in Las Vegas.  It is STILL a legit and great place to eat. I was shocked of how fast the food came out after we ordered. I had a regular margarita and shared a Donnie burger with some chili cheese fries. The burger was cooked to perfection and the chili fries were out of this world.  The chili has awesome flavor!  I totally recommend going to Wahlburgers when you are in the area, they do not disappoint.

H3vtUJ72QJ2BOi128rbzIw.text: First time here, the O.F.D burger is AMAZING!!! The bacon is crisp, the patty was cooked just right, the mushrooms and the Swiss cheese are a perfect compliment! I was a little afraid of the tomato jam, but it works! Great service, cool vibe, highly recommended!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. O.F.D burger is AMAZING!!!

EVQSl4Nr3GVZrXdcIssBPQ.text: They took away our food before we were finished...It was okay but really not a place to come when you're hungry...

h4lM6lWWeSyrh1-Y_RjAgg.text: My boyfriend has been wanting to eat a Wahlburger since the premiere of their show, he's a big fan of the Wahlburgs so of coarse we came out to vegas for his birthday and saw their beautiful building piercing on the strip and had to go! We're from the Los Angeles area and are aware there is one opening up on sunset and are really looking forward to dining there as well. But Las Vegas location set the bar high. Great service, we absolutely loved our waiter, the burger fries and onion rings were beyond delicious. Everything cooked perfectly. Awesome place we are looking forward to coming back

Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy burger with perfect amount of jalapeños

0uLkjd5s7DsKq6V_kbarcQ.text: My boyfriend watches the show so when we were in Vegas he had to make a stop in.  We came in at about 9:30pm and it was fairly busy but we got sat right away.  Our server was really polite and the service was fairly fast. The burgers were a little disappointing, a tad small and not a lot of flavor. Their special sauce was good but they only put a little bit on each burger, I wouldn't protest them loading it on the bun. The onion strings were really good and enough for two to share. Glad we went so we can say we have been there but not the best burgers.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mc1xRo3trLgv9gMaPdXv1A.text: Food was amazing!! I had the Jenn's chicken bowl salad. I always eat here when I visit Las Vegas. Service is exceptional and love the atmosphere. If i had 10 stars would give this place

mNy1tMRVnjgR9BLigz1pIw.text: This is by FAR the BEST burger joint in the West Coast hands down (#2. Smashburger #3. In-N-Out). The food is REALLY good and MAKES your mouth SING with JOY! Service is just ALRIGHT and PRICE is just a LITTLE bit HIGH for the portion SIZE you get BUT DEFINITELY worth it. The inside atmosphere is just ALRIGHT too like a DINER type atmosphere. Also, this place is ALWAYS crowded during PEAK lunchtime and dinner time. EXPECT a long line with a wait time because of their BUSYNESS. Finding a PARKING spot is HARD and a challenge DURING their PEAK time because of their LOCATION which is right off the STRIP area. DEFINITELY visit this place ONE time if you're ever in Vegas and CRAVING for some EXCELLENT burger.

jjrYcoj5FOTei2i4rOnpig.text: Omg... our first time in Vegas, of course we had to try Wahlburgers... I tried Marks fave. It was delicious! everyone senses food was fantastic too. Especially the sloppy Joe. All in all, great experience.  Our server Victor was great as well!

8n7HUhZPHnaoLy7RlslQ9w.text: This was one of the worst 12 dollars I have ever spent. I ordered a Chicken BOWL with the Sauteed onions on the side. Turns out it was a salad with no dressing and literally 3 tiny chucks of chicken. The server was confused when she brought it. She asked me, "why didnt they tossed your bowl in salad dressing?" . I asked her if this was the bowl, she said yes our BOWLS are really just salads...She then brought out two sides of dressing. It was watery. Way too much lettuce and not enough of anything else. Such a waste.  I paid 12 bucks for literally just lettuce and 3 small chunks of grilled chicken. Our server left midway during the meal and didnt even say she was leaving for the night. I'm not sure if she was sent home or what. The new server that came over was nice but clueless and the damage had been done. My friend had the mac n cheese and said it was like box mac n cheese with bacon bits on top. I've spend 12 bucks in a bunch of bad ways and this is probably one of the worst. 14 with tax.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This was allegedly the Chicken Bowl. There is no dressing. Looks just thrown on a plate and served to an actual customer

4qKdtM1AI-AuloaZejxBEg.text: The service tonight was amazing as was the food.  The staff (Luce especially) was so nice.  Unfortunately we don't get to Vegas often,  but we'll definitely be back when we're in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Vh25IslTbnjJkQLaXz_KSg.text: Amazing burgers and very friendly staff.  Walked here from the mirage to watch the Seahawks game -- they have quite a few TVs in the bar area.  They have a semi-enclosed patio that gets lots of shade as well.  Back to the food; the burger was amazing; the bun was one of my favorite parts.  I ordered a side of onion rings, but they were more like shoestring style --- they were good but hard to eat.  The bartenders were all extremely friendly and prompt. This is a great stop for a burger in Vegas.

RxCWdM2hyVQp3FKDcxQDlg.text: This place is on the strip but you can't see it - there is a shopping area with cute little places and other little bars - it's behind that -   So let me say this place is a hidden gem fresh cooked and unique flavors super delicious I highly recommend this place. Honestly the best food I had on my trip. If your looking for some good food at a reasonable price this is the place !

tn1KUPeMRaFmLKVAnGS9gg.text: This is my favorite place to eat a burger on the strip they have great food that is always fresh not just the meats either everything seems to be very fresh the bread , toppings , sides , all of it and everyone has been very friendly every time I've been in I would recommend it to anyone who's a burger fun

YA9ivk_wYoNHPhboin9Yzg.text: Overrated. I must admit, I was disappointed. Upon arriving and seeing the restaurant packed, I was excited to try for my first time. It was an experience and the staff was very nice and helpful. Although, the flavors weren't there for burger nor their popular onion fries. Everything was freshly made but other than that, I won't be coming back - especially for the price!

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

CSxqpm3bQjvzUJXyefw8mQ.text: We are local here in Vegas and haven't been to Wahlburgers until today. I expected an average burger, and for it not live up to all of the hype. I ordered the house burger (med rare) and the haystack style onion rings. I'm not exaggerating when I say this was the best tasting burger that I have ever eaten! It was so fresh, and the quality of the meat was beyond anything I expected. There's nothing fancy about it...it was just a very good quality burger with very fresh ingredients. I can't say enough about how good it was! And the onion rings were so thin, crispy, and deliciously flavored with some type of herbs mixed in. At first I was thinking $10.95 for a 1/3 pound burger was a little on the expensive side, but I've had $20+ burgers that aren't even close to the quality as this burger. I highly recommend Wahlburgers, and can't wait to take my wife to try it. I forgot what the beef patty is made from...I do know that it is a mix of ground short rib, and ground chuck and one other type of beef. It melts in your mouth! If you order medium rare...you can expect it to be actually med rare. So, if you don't like it very pink (I do) I would suggest that you order it medium. I love this place and have never been "wowed" by a burger like this one. I'd give it 10 stars if I could!  Awesome food!

s8QU4U4sRfRXmAlsWfahZQ.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by Wahlburgers when eating there. Their sloppy Joe is to DIE FOR! What's more I never had such yummy tater tots as the ones at Wahlburgers! (And I've had my share of tater tots)Luckily for me Wahlburgers recently opened a new location not far from where I live! I will definitely be recommending to friends family and all my fellow Yelpers!

MEGHFQVW21_S8I3gaXtYaw.text: Really delicious, Donnie favorite burger is my favorite. Little spicy but so good  fries are basic and the onion rings were good but very skinny like shoe string onion rings.

qyiGLbbjt1LxDCQzCxi4ww.text: Hamburgers were actually good but more than anything after watching this series on TV the family and I just wanted to try it out. We are sure glad we did!  *Thanksgiving Day Sandwich *Our Burger *Mom's Sloppy Joe *BBQ Bacon *Onion Fries *Sweet Potato Tots *Mac n Cheese w/ Bacon (side)

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States

AX1Wm3a9BzYGRLWmE6utVQ.text: One of the best burgers ever! The pickles....so delicious!! The only thing that I didn't like about the place was it was very loud inside so we had to almost yell to talk to each other. Loved the pictures on the wall and our server was attentive and friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of Wahlburgers - Las Vegas, NV, United States
